quote: “I must not fear. Fear is the mind-killer. Fear is the little-death that brings total obliteration. I will face my fear. I will permit it to pass over me and through me. And when it has gone past I will turn the inner eye to see its path. Where the fear has gone there will be nothing. Only I will remain.”
Author: Frank Herbert,

quote: “Attitude is a choice. Happiness is a choice. Optimism is a choice. Kindness is a choice. Giving is a choice. Respect is a choice. Whatever choice you make makes you. Choose wisely.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “It’s only after you’ve stepped outside your comfort zone that you begin to change, grow, and transform.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “The truth is, unless you let go, unless you forgive yourself, unless you forgive the situation, unless you realize that the situation is over, you cannot move forward.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Dare to Be
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Do what is right, not what is easy nor what is popular.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “Live the Life of Your Dreams: Be brave enough to live the life of your dreams according to your vision and purpose instead of the expectations and opinions of others.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “Pursue what catches your heart, not what catches your eyes.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “Be grateful for what you already have while you pursue your goals.
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “Believe in yourself. You are braver than you think, more talented than you know, and capable of more than you imagine.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “Letting go means to come to the realization that some people are a part of your history, but not a part of your destiny.”
Author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “Life is about accepting the challenges along the way, choosing to keep moving forward, and savoring the journey.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “Start each day with a positive thought and a grateful heart.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “Be brave to stand for what you believe in even if you stand alone.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “Everything can be taken from a man but one thing: the last of the human freedoms—to choose one’s attitude in any given set of circumstances, to choose one’s own way.”
Author: Viktor E. Frankl,

quote: “Do not fear failure but rather fear not trying.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “Never lose hope. Storms make people stronger and never last forever.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “Lack of direction, not lack of time, is the problem. We all have twenty-four hour days.”
Author: Zig Ziglar

quote: “Cry. Forgive. Learn. Move on. Let your tears water the seeds of your future happiness.”
Author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “You never change your life until you step out of your comfort zone; change begins at the end of your comfort zone.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Do not let the memories of your past limit the potential of your future. There are no limits to what you can achieve on your journey through life, except in your mind.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “Let the improvement of yourself keep you so busy that you have no time to criticize others.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “Incredible change happens in your life when you decide to take control of what you do have power over instead of craving control over what you don't.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Happiness is not the absence of problems, it's the ability to deal with them.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Believe in your infinite potential. Your only limitations are those you set upon yourself.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “The man who moves a mountain begins by carrying away small stones.”
Author: Confucius,

quote: “The only way of discovering the limits of the possible is to venture a little way past them into the impossible.”
Author: Arthur C. Clarke

quote: “Surround Yourself with People Who Believe in Your Dreams:
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “Sometimes life knocks you on your ass... get up, get up, get up!!! Happiness is not the absence of problems, it's the ability to deal with them.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Do what you love, love what you do, and with all your heart give yourself to it.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “Without ambition one starts nothing. Without work one finishes nothing. The prize will not be sent to you. You have to win it.”
Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: “Once you realize you deserve a bright future, letting go of your dark past is the best choice you will ever make.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “If you believe very strongly in something, stand up and fight for it.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “Change the way you look at things and the things you look at change.”
Author: Wayne W. Dyer

quote: “It's never too late to change your life for the better. You don't have to take huge steps to change your life. Making even the smallest changes to your daily routine can make a big difference to your life.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “Learn the rules like a pro, so you can break them like an artist.”
Author: Pablo Picasso

quote: “Always remember people who have helped you along the way, and don’t forget to lift someone up.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “The biggest wall you have to climb is the one you build in your mind: Never let your mind talk you out of your dreams, trick you into giving up. Never let your mind become the greatest obstacle to success. To get your mind on the right track, the rest will follow.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “What's done is done. What's gone is gone. One of life's lessons is always moving on. It’s okay to look back to see how far you’ve come but keep moving forward.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “When in a relationship, a real man doesn't make his woman jealous of others, he makes others jealous of his woman.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Maturity is when you stop complaining and making excuses, and start making changes.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “Never stop dreaming,
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “Strong people have a strong sense of self-worth and self-awareness; they don’t need the approval of others.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “Do not let arrogance go to your head and despair to your heart; do not let compliments go to your head and criticisms to your heart; do not let success go to your head and failure to your heart.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “When the going gets tough, put one foot in front of the other and just keep going. Don’t give up.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “Stop giving other people the power to control your happiness, your mind, and your life. If you don't take control of yourself and your own life, someone else is bound to try.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “At the end of the day, let there be no excuses, no explanations, no regrets.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “We all make mistakes, have struggles, and even regret things in our past. But you are not your mistakes, you are not your struggles, and you are here NOW with the power to shape your day and your future.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “If you have a strong purpose in life, you don't have to be pushed. Your passion will drive you there.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “Although the world is full of suffering, it is full also of the overcoming of it.”
Author: Helen Keller

quote: “You must learn to let go. Release the stress. You were never in control anyway.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “I will not try to convince you to love me, to respect me, to commit to me. I deserve better than that; I AM BETTER THAN THAT...Goodbye.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Circumstances are the rulers of the weak; they are but the instruments of the wise.”
Author: Samuel Lover,

quote: “Whatever the mind can conceive and believe, it can achieve.”
Author: Napoleon Hill,

quote: “Make a pact with yourself today to not be defined by your past. Sometimes the greatest thing to come out of all your hard work isn't what you get for it, but what you become for it. Shake things up today! Be You...Be Free...Share.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “The strongest people find the courage and caring to help others, even if they are going through their own storm.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “Action may not always bring happiness, but there is no happiness without action. ”
Author: William James

quote: “You Are the Master of Your Attitude
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “Patience Is Not the Ability to Wait:
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “You are unique. You have different talents and abilities. You don’t have to always follow in the footsteps of others. And most important, you should always remind yourself that you don't have to do what everyone else is doing and have a responsibility to develop the talents you have been given.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “Each day brings new opportunities, allowing you to constantly live with love—be there for others—bring a little light into someone's day. Be grateful and live each day to the fullest.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “You cannot change anyone, but you can be the reason someone changes.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “The surest way to make your dreams come true is to live them.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Do not stop thinking of life as an adventure. You have no security unless you can live bravely, excitingly, imaginatively; unless you can choose a challenge instead of competence.”
Author: Eleanor Roosevelt,

quote: “Courage is feeling fear, not getting rid of fear, and taking action in the face of fear.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “To have what you have never had, you have to do what you have never done.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “Live the Life of Your Dreams
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “If you hang out with chickens, you're going to cluck and if you hang out with eagles, you're going to fly.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “However mean your life is, meet it and live it; do not shun it and call it hard names. It is not so bad as you are. It looks poorest when you are richest. The fault-finder will find faults even in paradise. Love your life, poor as it is. You may perhaps have some pleasant, thrilling, glorious hours, even in a poorhouse.
Author: Henry David Thoreau,

quote: “Get Off The Scale!
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “People are always blaming their circumstances for what they are. I don't believe in circumstances. The people who get on in this world are the people who get up and look for the circumstances they want, and if they can't find them, make them.”
Author: George Bernard Shaw,

quote: “Renew, release, let go. Yesterday’s gone. There’s nothing you can do to bring it back. You can’t “should’ve” done something. You can only DO something. Renew yourself. Release that attachment. Today is a new day!”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “You are the average of the five people you spend the most time with.”
Author: Jim Rohn

quote: “How would your life be different if…You walked away from gossip and verbal defamation? Let today be the day…You speak only the good you know of other people and encourage others to do the same.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Forget yesterday - it has already forgotten you. Don't sweat tomorrow - you haven't even met. Instead, open your eyes and your heart to a truly precious gift - today.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “I write for the same reason I breathe - because if I didn't, I would die.”
Author: Isaac Asimov

quote: “Don’t let others tell you what you can’t do. Don't let the limitations of others limit your vision. If you can remove your self-doubt and believe in yourself, you can achieve what you never thought possible.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “You have to accept whatever comes, and the only important thing is that you meet it with the best you have to give.”
Author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: “Only he who attempts the absurd is capable of achieving the impossible.”
Author: Miguel de Unamuno

quote: “In the end, you have to choose whether or not to trust someone.”
Author: Sophie Kinsella,

quote: “I want to live my life in such a way that when I get out of bed in the morning, the devil says, "aw shit, he's up!”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Don't wish it were easier. Wish you were better.”
Author: Jim Rohn

quote: “Great leaders create more leaders, not followers.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “LAW 4
Author: Robert Greene,

quote: “If you don’t give up on something you truly believe in, you will find a way.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “One of the most spiritual things you can do is embrace your humanity. Connect with those around you today. Say, "I love you", "I'm sorry", "I appreciate you", "I'm proud of you"...whatever you're feeling. Send random texts, write a cute note, embrace your truth and share it...cause a smile today for someone else...and give plenty of hugs.”
Author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “Don't confuse poor decision-making with destiny. Own your mistakes. It’s ok; we all make them. Learn from them so they can empower you!”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Discipline Your Mind to Think Positively: Discipline your mind to see the good in every situation and look on the best side of every event.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “How would your life be different if…You stopped allowing other people to dilute or poison your day with their words or opinions? Let today be the day…You stand strong in the truth of your beauty and journey through your day without attachment to the validation of others”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Turn your obstacles into opportunities and your problems into possibilities.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “Be the positive impact on the lives of others.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Why Not You?
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Dreams don't work unless you take action. The surest way to make your dreams come true is to live them.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Never respond to an angry person with a fiery comeback, even if he deserves it...Don't allow his anger to become your anger.”
Author: Bohdi Sanders,

quote: “Don't fear failure. — Not failure, but low aim, is the crime. In great attempts it is glorious even to fail.”
Author: Bruce Lee,

quote: “It takes sunshine and rain to make a rainbow. There would be no rainbows without sunshine and rain.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “I cannot let the fear of the past color the future.”
Author: Julie Kagawa,

quote: “Let today be the day you stop being haunted by the ghost of yesterday. Holding a grudge & harboring anger/resentment is poison to the soul. Get even with people...but not those who have hurt us, forget them, instead get even with those who have helped us.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “It doesn't matter what you did or where you were...it matters where you are and what you're doing. Get out there! Sing the song in your heart and NEVER let anyone shut you up!!”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “It doesn’t matter how many times you get knocked down. All that matters is you get up one more time than you were knocked down.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Failure is a bend in the road, not the end of the road. Learn from failure and keep moving forward.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “It takes guts and humility to admit mistakes. Admitting we're wrong is courage, not weakness.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “Time is an equal opportunity employer. Each human being has exactly the same number of hours and minutes every day. Rich people can't buy more hours. Scientists can't invent new minutes. And you can't save time to spend it on another day. Even so, time is amazingly fair and forgiving. No matter how much time you've wasted in the past, you still have an entire tomorrow.”
Author: Denis Waitley

quote: “Don't wait for the right moment to start, start and make each moment right.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “Don’t wait for things to happen. Make them happen.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “You learn something valuable from all of the significant events and people, but you never touch your true potential until you challenge yourself to go beyond imposed limitations.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Rejection is an opportunity for your selection.”
Author: Bernard Branson

quote: “What you stay focused on will grow.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Remember to look up at the stars and not down at your feet. Try to make sense of what you see and wonder about what makes the universe exist. Be curious. And however difficult life may seem, there is always something you can do and succeed at.
Author: Stephen Hawking

quote: “Good people see the good and bring out the best in other people.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “It’s important that what thoughts you are feeding into your mind because your thoughts create your belief and experiences. You have positive thoughts and you have negative ones too. Nurture your mind with positive thoughts: kindness, empathy, compassion, peace, love, joy, humility, generosity, etc. The more you feed your mind with positive thoughts, the more you can attract great things into your life.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “Be silent and safe — silence never betrays you;
Author: John Boyle O'Reilly,

quote: “Gratitude builds a bridge to abundance.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “Challenge and adversity are meant to help you know who you are. Storms hit your weakness, but unlock your true strength.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “The universe doesn’t give you what you ask for with your thoughts - it gives you what you demand with your actions.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Perfectly Imperfect
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Stop doing what is easy. Start doing what is right.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “Changing your outside world cannot make you happy if you are an unhappy person. The real personal change can only happen from the inside out. If you firstly create the change within yourself, you can turn your life around.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “7 Effective Ways to Make Others Feel Important
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “My past has not defined me, destroyed me, deterred me, or defeated me; it has only strengthened me.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “One resolution I have made, and try always to keep, is this: ‘To rise above little things’.”
Author: John Burroughs

quote: “Plant seeds of happiness, hope, success, and love; it will all come back to you in abundance. This is the law of nature.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “When things do not go your way, remember that every challenge — every adversity — contains within it the seeds of opportunity and growth.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “The one who falls and gets up is stronger than the one who never tried. Do not fear failure but rather fear not trying.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “You were put on this earth to achieve your greatest self, to live out your purpose, and to do it courageously.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Make the most of the best and the best of the worst, and keep your standards high. Never settle for anything less than you deserve or are capable of achieving.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “Beliefs are choices. First you choose your beliefs. Then your beliefs affect your choices.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “People who lack the clarity, courage, or determination to follow their own dreams will often find ways to discourage yours. When you change for the better, the people around you will be inspired to change also....but only after doing their best to make you stop. Live your truth and don't EVER stop.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “You were born to stand out, stop trying to fit in.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “It doesn't matter if a million people tell you what you can't do, or if ten million tell you no. If you get one yes from God that's all you need.”
Author: Tyler Perry

quote: “You are essentially who you create yourself to be and all that occurs in your life is the result of your own making.”
Author: Stephen Richards,

quote: “The reason many people in our society are miserable, sick, and highly stressed is because of an unhealthy attachment to things they have no control over.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Life is short. Focus on what really matters most. You have to change your priorities over time.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “First say to yourself what you would be;
Author: Epictetus

quote: “Surround Yourself with Positive People Who Believe in Your Dreams
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “Change may not always bring growth, but there is no growth without change.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “Great leaders can see the greatness in others when they can’t see it themselves and lead them to their highest potential they don’t even know.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “When you take control of your attitude, you take control of your life.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “Always believe in yourself and always stretch yourself beyond your limits. Your life is worth a lot more than you think because you are capable of accomplishing more than you know. You have more potential than you think, but you will never know your full potential unless you keep challenging yourself and pushing beyond your own self imposed limits.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “Stop doing what is easy or popular. Start doing what is right.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “To learn something new, you need to try new things and not be afraid to be wrong.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Enthusiasm can help you find the new doors, but it takes passion to open them. If you have a strong purpose in life, you don't have to be pushed. Your passion will drive you there.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “One of the best ways to influence people is to make them feel important.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “The comfort zone is a psychological state in which one feels familiar, safe, at ease, and secure. You never change your life until you step out of your comfort zone; change begins at the end of your comfort zone.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Let go of something old that no longer serves you in order to make room for something new.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “It's funny how, in this journey of life, even though we may begin at different times and places, our paths cross with others so that we may share our love, compassion, observations, and hope. This is a design of God that I appreciate and cherish.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Fear robs you of your freedom to make the right choice in life that can bridge the gap between where you are and where you want to be. On the other side of fear, lies freedom. If you want to grow, you need to be brave and take risks. If you're not uncomfortable, you're not growing.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “Stay strong, stay positive, and never give up.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “Want to keep Christ in Christmas? Feed the hungry, clothe the naked, forgive the guilty, welcome the unwanted, care for the ill, love your enemies, and do unto others as you would have done unto you.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “This life is for loving, sharing, learning, smiling, caring, forgiving, laughing, hugging, helping, dancing, wondering, healing, and even more loving. I choose to live life this way. I want to live my life in such a way that when I get out of bed in the morning, the devil says, 'aw shit, he's up!”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “You are not a victim. No matter what you have been through, you're still here. You may have been challenged, hurt, betrayed, beaten, and discouraged, but nothing has defeated you. You are still here! You have been delayed but not denied. You are not a victim, you are a victor. You have a history of victory.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “The right thing to do and the hard thing to do are usually the same.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Consistency is the true foundation of trust. Either keep your promises or do not make them.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “LAW 46
Author: Robert Greene,

quote: “Shine your light and make a positive impact on the world; there is nothing so honorable as helping improve the lives of others.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Dream your own dreams, achieve your own goals. Your journey is your own and unique.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “I cannot compromise my respect for your love. You can keep your love, I will keep my respect.”
Author: Amit Kalantri,

quote: “Great Leaders Create More Leaders
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “Everything is hard before it is easy”
Author: Goethe J.W.

quote: “How would your life be different if…You stopped worrying about things you can’t control and started focusing on the things you can? Let today be the day…You free yourself from fruitless worry, seize the day and take effective action on things you can change.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “The discontent and frustration that you feel is entirely your own creation.”
Author: Stephen Richards,

quote: “Life teaches us the right path is rarely the easy one.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “Be with someone who inspires you and makes you be the best version of yourself.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “No one has ever achieved greatness without dreams.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “Failures are the stairs we climb to reach success.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “Keep in mind that the true measure of an individual is how he treats a person who can do him absolutely no good.”
Author: Ann Landers

quote: “The harder you fall, the heavier your heart; the heavier your heart, the stronger you climb; the stronger you climb, the higher your pedestal.”
Author: Criss Jami,

quote: “Difficulties and adversities viciously force all their might on us and cause us to fall apart, but they are necessary elements of individual growth and reveal our true potential. We have got to endure and overcome them, and move forward. Never lose hope. Storms make people stronger and never last forever.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “You can have everything you want if you can put your heart and soul into everything you do.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Every choice comes with a consequence. Once you make a choice, you must accept responsibility. You cannot escape the consequences of your choices, whether you like them or not.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “Free yourself from the complexities and drama of your life. Simplify. Look within. Within ourselves we all have the gifts and talents we need to fulfill the purpose we've been blessed with.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Live boldly. Push yourself. Don't settle.”
Author: Jojo Moyes,

quote: “How much you can learn when you fail determines how far you will go into achieving your goals.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “Create a vision for the life you really want and then work relentlessly towards making it a reality.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “Change course, but don’t give up.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “No matter how much experience you have, there’s always something new you can learn and room for improvement.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “Today is a new day. Don't let your history interfere with your destiny! Let today be the day you stop being a victim of your circumstances and start taking action towards the life you want. You have the power and the time to shape your life. Break free from the poisonous victim mentality and embrace the truth of your greatness. You were not meant for a mundane or mediocre life!”
Author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “Be where you are, stop over-thinking, and focus on what you are doing.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “LAW 25
Author: Robert Greene,

quote: “The greatest step towards a life of simplicity is to learn to let go.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Those with a grateful mindset tend to see the message in the mess. And even though life may knock them down, the grateful find reasons, if even small ones, to get up.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “After sleeping through a hundred million centuries we have finally opened our eyes on a sumptuous planet, sparkling with color, bountiful with life. Within decades we must close our eyes again. Isn’t it a noble, an enlightened way of spending our brief time in the sun, to work at understanding the universe and how we have come to wake up in it? This is how I answer when I am asked—as I am surprisingly often—why I bother to get up in the mornings.”
Author: Richard Dawkins

quote: “If you have a goal, write it down. If you do not write it down, you do not have a goal - you have a wish.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “If you care about something enough, you'll find a way to make it happen.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Do not let your negative thoughts have power over you because those thoughts will end up controlling your life. No one can live a positive life with a negative mind.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “There is great change to be experienced once you learn the power of letting go. Stop allowing anyone or anything to control, limit, repress, or discourage you from being your true self! Today is YOURS to shape - own it - break free from people and things that poison or dilute your spirit.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “There is no more profitable investment than investing in yourself. It is the best investment you can make; you can never go wrong with it. It is the true way to improve yourself to be the best version of you and lets you be able to best serve those around you.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “To overcome fear is the quickest way to gain your self-confidence.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “One must always be prepared for riotous and endless waves of transformation.”
Author: Elizabeth Gilbert,

quote: “LAW 38
Author: Robert Greene,

quote: “Your complaints, your drama, your victim mentality, your whining, your blaming, and all of your excuses have NEVER gotten you even a single step closer to your goals or dreams. Let go of your nonsense. Let go of the delusion that you DESERVE better and go EARN it! Today is a new day!”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “You are never alone. You are eternally connected with everyone.”
Author: Amit Ray,

quote: “Believe in your infinite potential. Your only limitations are those you set upon yourself.
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “War is an ugly thing, but not the ugliest of things: the decayed and degraded state of moral and patriotic feeling which thinks that nothing is worth a war, is much worse. When a people are used as mere human instruments for firing cannon or thrusting bayonets, in the service and for the selfish purposes of a master, such war degrades a people. A war to protect other human beings against tyrannical injustice; a war to give victory to their own ideas of right and good, and which is their own war, carried on for an honest purpose by their free choice, — is often the means of their regeneration. A man who has nothing which he is willing to fight for, nothing which he cares more about than he does about his personal safety, is a miserable creature who has no chance of being free, unless made and kept so by the exertions of better men than himself. As long as justice and injustice have not terminated their ever-renewing fight for ascendancy in the affairs of mankind, human beings must be willing, when need is, to do battle for the one against the other.”
Author: John Stuart Mill,

quote: “Instead of worrying about what could go wrong, change your thoughts to what could go right. When you change the negative thought into a positive one, it eliminates the negative one.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “What helps you persevere is your resilience and commitment.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “You make the world a better place by making daily improvements to become the best version of yourself.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “There are some values that you should never compromise on to stay true to yourself; you should be brave to stand up for what you truly believe in even if you stand alone.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “Be careful the stories you're telling yourself about your current circumstances; a head full of negative thoughts has no space for positive ones.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “Every challenge you face today makes you stronger tomorrow. The challenge of life is intended to make you better, not bitter.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “...yelling doesn't make a thing any more possible.”
Author: Angie Sage,

quote: “It's not what we do once in a while that shapes our lives. It's what we do consistently.”
Author: Anthony Robbins

quote: “When you concentrate your energy purposely on the future possibility that you aspire to realize, your energy is passed on to it and makes it attracted to you with a force stronger than the one you directed towards it.”
Author: Stephen Richards,

quote: “You attract who you are being. When you work at being the type of person that you want to attract, you attract those kinds of people into your life.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “A gentleman is someone who does not what he wants to do, but what he should do.”
Author: Haruki Murakami,

quote: “You have come a long way and have won many battles. Whenever you’re faced with a difficult or challenging situation, you’ll overcome it. Yes, you can.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “You have two choices, to conquer your fear or to let your fear conquer you.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “If you've got nothing to dance about, find a reason to sing.”
Author: Melody Carstairs

quote: “If you believe you can, you might. If you know you can, you will.”
Author: Steve Maraboli ,

quote: “Sometimes it's worth lingering on the journey for a while before getting to the destination.”
Author: Richelle Mead,

quote: “It is impossible to discourage the real writers - they don't give a damn what you say, they're going to write.”
Author: Sinclair Lewis

quote: “Make today worth remembering.”
Author: Zig Ziglar

quote: “What the mind can conceive and believe, and the heart desire, you can achieve.”
Author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: “One of the best ways to influence people is to make them feel important. Most people enjoy those rare moments when others make them feel important. It is one of the deepest human desires.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “People who lack the clarity, courage, or determination to follow their own dreams will often find ways to discourage yours. Live your truth and don't EVER stop!”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Make the most of what you have and keep your standards high. Never settle for anything less than you deserve or are capable of achieving.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “Act the way you'd like to be and soon you'll be the way you'd like to act.”
Author: Bob Dylan

quote: “Don't chase people. Be yourself, do your own thing and work hard. The right people - the ones who really belong in your life - will come to your. And stay.”
Author: Will Smith

quote: “Life keeps throwing me lemons because I make the best lemonade...”
Author: King James Gadsden

quote: “Your greatest self has been waiting your whole life; don't make it wait any longer.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Real change is difficult at the beginning. Without the familiar to rely upon, you may not in as much command as you had once been. When things are not going your way, you will start doubting yourself. Stay positive, keep the faith, and keep moving forward – your breakthrough may be just around the corner.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Life is short. Focus on what really matters most; you should change your priorities over time.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Keep your promises and be consistent. Be the kind of person others can trust.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “If you fuel your journey on the opinions of others, you are going to run out of gas.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “We have been called to heal wounds, to unite what has fallen apart, and to bring home those who have lost their way.”
Author: St. Francis of Assisi

quote: “Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears.”
Author: Les Brown

quote: “The most intriguing people you will encounter in this life are the people who had insights about you, that you didn't know about yourself.”
Author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: “Love is as simple as the absence of self given to another. God, when invited, fills the void of any unrequited love; hence loving is how one is drawn closer to God no matter its most horrific repercussions.”
Author: Criss Jami,

quote: “Learn everything you can, anytime you can, from anyone you can, there will always come a time when you will be grateful you did.”
Author: Sarah Caldwell

quote: “Faith moves mountains, love transforms hearts.”
Author: John Paul Warren

quote: “Set the standard! Stop expecting others to show you love, acceptance, commitment, & respect when you don't even show that to yourself.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Sometimes letting go is simply changing the labels you place on an event. Looking at the same event with fresh eyes.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Create your own miracles; do what you think you cannot do.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Do what you think is right. Don't let people make the decision of right or wrong for you.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Our deepest fear is not that we are inadequate. Our deepest fear is that we are powerful beyond measure. It is our light, not our darkness that most frightens us. We ask ourselves, Who am I to be brilliant, gorgeous, talented, fabulous? Actually, who are you not to be?”
Author: Marianne Williamson,

quote: “People will always have opinions about your decision because they're not courageous enough to take action on their opinion.”
Author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “If you think you are beaten, you are
Author: Walter D. Wintle

quote: “If you are not the hero of your own story, then you're missing the whole point of your humanity.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “A young outcast will often feel that there is something wrong with himself, but as he gets older, grows more confident in who he is, he will adapt, he will begin to feel that there is something wrong with everyone else.”
Author: Criss Jami,

quote: “The level of success you achieve will be in direct proportion to the depth of your commitment.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “Integrity is doing what is right and truthful, and doing as you say you would do.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “You have a unique gift to offer this world. Be true to yourself, be kind to yourself, read and learn about everything that interests you and keep away from people who bring you down. When you treat yourself kindly and respect the uniqueness of those around you, you will be giving this world an amazing gift... YOU!”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Act as if! Act as if you're a wealthy man, rich already, and then you'll surely become rich. Act as if you have unmatched confidence and then people will surely have confidence in you. Act as if you have unmatched experience and then people will follow your advice. And act as if you are already a tremendous success, and as sure as I stand here today - you will become successful.”
Author: Jordan Belfort,

quote: “Annual income twenty pounds, annual expenditure nineteen nineteen and six , result happiness.
Author: Charles Dickens,

quote: “No matter what your history has been, your destiny is what you create today. What are you going to create?”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Don't bother just to be better than your contemporaries or predecessors. Try to be better than yourself.”
Author: William Faulkner

quote: “I will be generous with my love today. I will sprinkle compliments and uplifting words everywhere I go. I will do this knowing that my words are like seeds and when they fall on fertile soil, a reflection of those seeds will grow into something greater.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Times will change for the better when you change.”
Author: Maxwell Maltz

quote: “Your opinion is not my reality.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “When you are living the best version of yourself, you inspire others to live the best versions of themselves.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Plants are more courageous than almost all human beings: an orange tree would rather die than produce lemons, whereas instead of dying the average person would rather be someone they are not.”
Author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quote: “‎Today is a new day. It's a day you have never seen before and will never see again. Stop telling yourself the 'same crap, different day' lie! How many days has that lie stolen from you? Seize the wonder and uniqueness of today! Recognize that throughout this beautiful day, you have an incredible amount of opportunities to move your life into the direction you want it to go.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “God is whispering in your heart, in the whole existence, just tune your ears.”
Author: Amit Ray,

quote: “12--Lose Battles, But Win The War: Grand Strategy
Author: Robert Greene,

quote: “Leaders are limited by their vision rather than by their abilities.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Life has no limitations, except the ones you make.”
Author: Les Brown

quote: “Ever Tried. Ever Failed. No matter. Try again. Fail again. Fail better.”
Author: Samuel Beckett

quote: “Now is the time to get serious about living your ideals. How long can you afford to put off who you really want to be? Your nobler self cannot wait any longer. Put your principles into practice – now. Stop the excuses and the procrastination. This is your life! You aren’t a child anymore. The sooner you set yourself to your spiritual program, the happier you will be. The longer you wait, the more you’ll be vulnerable to mediocrity and feel filled with shame and regret, because you know you are capable of better. From this instant on, vow to stop disappointing yourself. Separate yourself from the mob. Decide to be extraordinary and do what you need to do – now.”
Author: Epictetus,

quote: “Look around you. Everything changes. Everything on this earth is in a continuous state of evolving, refining, improving, adapting, enhancing…changing. You were not put on this earth to remain stagnant.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “God helps those who strut their stuff.”
Author: Dan Sofer,

quote: “Become the leader of your life. Lead yourself to where you want to be. Breathe life back into your ambitions, your desires, your goals, your relationships.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “And worse I may be yet: the worst is not
Author: William Shakespeare,

quote: “My atheism, like that of
Author: George Santayana,

quote: “One of the best ways to influence people is to make those around you feel important.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Holding a grudge & harboring anger/resentment is poison to the soul. Get even with people...but not those who have hurt us, forget them, instead get even with those who have helped us.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Because when we give too many fucks, when we choose to give a fuck about everything, then we feel as though we are perpetually entitled to feel comfortable and happy at all times, that’s when life fucks us.”
Author: Mark Manson,

quote: “If an apology is followed by an excuse or a reason, it means they are going to commit same mistake again they just apologized for.”
Author: Amit Kalantri

quote: “To be heroic is to be courageous enough to die for something; to be inspirational is to be crazy enough to live a little.”
Author: Criss Jami,

quote: “Make your work to be in keeping with your purpose”
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: “Until you change how you get things done, you'll never know what works best.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “Your beliefs affect your choices. Your choices shape your actions. Your actions determine your results. The future you create depends upon the choices you make and the actions you take today.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “The spirit of the individual is determined by his dominating thought habits.”
Author: Bruce Lee,

quote: “Don't give up! It's not over. The universe is balanced. Every set-back bears with it the seeds of a come-back.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Once your mindset changes, everything on the outside will change along with it.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Finding the lesson behind every adversity will be the one important thing that helps get you through it.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Either you run the day or the day runs you..”
Author: Jim Rohn

quote: “I am not a victim. No matter what I have been through, I'm still here. I have a history of victory.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Happiness is a state of mind, a choice, a way of living; it is not something to be achieved, it is something to be experienced.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “The more you believed in yourself, the more you could trust yourself. The more you trust yourself, the less you compare yourself to others.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “If you're waiting until you feel talented enough to make it, you'll never make it.”
Author: Criss Jami,

quote: “How would your life be different if…You didn’t allow yourself to be defined by your past? Let today be the day…You stop letting your history interfere with your destiny and awaken to the opportunity to release your greatest self.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Remember that things are not always as they appear to be… Curiosity creates possibilities and opportunities.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Stop blaming outside circumstances for your inside chaos.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “The more you talk about them, the more important they will feel. The more you listen to them, the more important you will make them feel.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “A photograph shouldn't be just a picture, it should be a philosophy.”
Author: Amit Kalantri,

quote: “If you can’t believe in miracles, then believe in yourself. When you want something bad enough, let that drive push you to make it happen. Sometimes you’ll run into brick walls that are put there to test you. Find a way around them and stay focused on your dream. Where there’s a will, there’s a way.”
Author: Isabel  Lopez,

quote: “Most people fail in life not because they aim too high and miss, but because they aim too low and hit.”
Author: Les Brown

quote: “If you take responsibility for yourself you will develop a hunger to accomplish your dreams.”
Author: Les Brown

quote: “When was the last time you woke up and realized that today could be the best day of your life?”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Real change is difficult at the beginning, but gorgeous at the end. Change begins the moment you get the courage and step outside your comfort zone; change begins at the end of your comfort zone.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Being defeated is often a temporary condition. Giving up is what makes it permanent.”
Author: Marilyn vos Savant

quote: “The greatest revenge is massive success.”
Author: Les Brown

quote: “الأحلام التي لا تدفعك للتحدث عنها بشغف هي أحلام ناقصة”
Author: ياسر حارب,

quote: “You make mistakes, mistakes don't make you”
Author: Maxwell Maltz

quote: “Live out of your imagination instead of out of your memory.”
Author: Les Brown

quote: “The most powerful magic of all is choice.”
Author: Sara Raasch,

quote: “It is difficult to make the right choice if you fear choosing wrongly.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Never let fear hold you captive.
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “Great goals make great people. People cannot hit what they do not aim for.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “Goals are the road maps that guide you to your destination.
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “Accept yourself, your strengths, your weaknesses, your truths, and know what tools you have to fulfill your purpose.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “It’s a lack of clarity that creates chaos and frustration. Those emotions are poison to any living goal.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Dedicate yourself to what gives your life true meaning and purpose; make a positive difference in someone's life.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Stop comparing yourself to others. Always strive to improve yourself to become better today than you were yesterday to serve those around you and the world.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Focus on making choices to lead your life that aligns with your core values in the most purposeful way possible.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Don't let the tall weeds cast a shadow on the beautiful flowers in your garden.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “For your past, for your flaws, and ultimately for your stress; I judge no one whom I’ve met along the way because in a sense we were all wounded in our own ways.”
Author: Forrest Curran

quote: “Simplify your life. You don't grow spiritual, you shrink spiritual.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “A great tree develops over time and can tell stories not only those of happiness, but also those that contain pain from what it has seen over the years, and as a result is the wise ancient tree that it is today. As the seasons change, the tree naturally goes through changes as well: where the leaves turn yellow and orange in the fall, falling by the Winter, returning in the Spring, and with full set of new leafs by the Summer. Love is no different in that there will be times when we are fully naked in the Winter, and left to wonder about Spring when it seemed so easy to love, yet the wise tree knows that no winter will last forever no matter how cold it may be.”
Author: Forrest Curran,

quote: “You have to lift a person up before you can really put them in their place.”
Author: Criss Jami,

quote: “‎Someone's opinion of you does not have to become your reality.”
Author: Les Brown

quote: “Seize the wind," I whispered. "Don't become the kite that never flies.”
Author: Elizabeth Lim,

quote: “Align yourself with people that you can learn from, people who want more out of life, people who are stretching and searching and seeking some higher ground in life.”
Author: Les Brown

quote: “Make the choice to embrace this day. Do not let your TODAY be stolen by the ghost of yesterday or the "To-Do" list of tomorrow! It’s inspiring to see all the wonderfully amazing things that can happen in a day in which you participate.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “We become so absorbed in our flaws and faults that we forget that it is better to be a diamond with a flaw than a pebble without. To have flaws is beauty in itself, a fact so frightening that we hurry to hide them from sight and tarnish the whole in the process of comparing ourselves to others.”
Author: Forrest Curran,

quote: “Shoot for the moon, because even if you miss you miss, you'll land in the stars.”
Author: Les Brown

quote: “Just because Fate doesn't deal you the right cards, it doesn't mean you should give up. It just means you have to play the cards you get to their maximum potential.”
Author: Les Brown

quote: “Sex is a powerful intent to create: the creation of pleasure, creation of love, and ultimately the creation of life. It connects and syncs two beings emotionally, physically, and mentally and is one of the strongest expressions of love that exists in this World.”
Author: Forrest Curran,

quote: “As I naturally go through a full range of emotions in my life, I mustn’t feel ashamed for feeling lost, for it is honest and human to feel such.”
Author: Forrest Curran,

quote: “People in general would rather die than forgive. It's
Author: Sue Monk Kidd

quote: “If a man has his eyes bound, you can encourage him as much as you like to stare through the bandage, but he'll never see anything.”
Author: Franz Kafka,

quote: “One day in my shoes and a day for me in your shoes, the beauty of travel lies in the ease and willingness to be more open.”
Author: Forrest Curran

quote: “الأمنيات التي لا تتحقق بسرعة تمنحنا وقتا للدعاء والتأمل”
Author: ياسر حارب,

quote: “Some we proudly display on our arms, while others we shyly conceal. Tattoo the moments of sorrow as well as the moments of splendor and beauty. Tattoo in an acknowledgment and tribute to home, and tattooing your beliefs that define who you are. Whether we intended to or not, every moment of our lives are tattooed to our heart.”
Author: Forrest Curran,

quote: “Whether you know or not, you are the infinite potential of love, peace and joy”
Author: Amit Ray

quote: “You can lose your MONEY. You can lose your FRIENDS. You can lose your JOB and you can lose your MARRIAGE...and still recover...as long as there is HOPE. Never lose HOPE.”
Author: John Paul Warren

quote: “Find a purpose to serve, not a lifestyle to live.”
Author: Criss Jami,

quote: “Be happy with who you are and what you do, and you can do anything you want.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “It's up to you today to start making healthy choices. Not choices that are just healthy for your body, but healthy for your mind.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Do not let another day go by where your dedication to other people's opinions is greater than your dedication to your own emotions!”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Although time seems to fly, it never travels faster than one day at a time. Each day is a new opportunity to live your life to the fullest. In each waking day, you will find scores of blessings and opportunities for positive change. Do not let your TODAY be stolen by the unchangeable past or the indefinite future! Today is a new day!”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Instead of complaining about the problem and blaming others, start finding the solution.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “Live life as though nobody is watching, and express yourself as though everyone is listening.”
Author: Nelson Mandela

quote: “We all have negative thoughts now and then, but we can choose not to dwell there and not to let them control us.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “People are successful because they think and act like successful people.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “Confidence is like a dragon where, for every head cut off, two more heads grow back.”
Author: Criss Jami,

quote: “Push yourself to do more and to experience more. Harness your energy to start expanding your dreams. Yes, expand your dreams. Don't accept a life of mediocrity when you hold such infinite potential within the fortress of your mind. Dare to tap into your greatness.”
Author: Robin S. Sharma,

quote: “Always Remember to take your Vitamins: Take your Vitamin A for ACTION, Vitamin B for Belief, Vitamin C for Confidence ,Vitamin D for Discipline, Vitamin E for Enthusiasm!!”
Author: Pablo

quote: “Not all dreamers are winners, but all winners are dreamers. Your dream is the key to your future. The Bible says that, "without a vision (dream), a people perish." You need a dream, if you're going to succeed in anything you do.”
Author: Mark Gorman

quote: “The size of your dreams must always exceed your current capacity to achieve them. If your dreams do not scare you, they are not big enough.”
Author: Ellen Johnson Sirleaf

quote: “At school, new ideas are thrust at you every day. Out in the world, you'll have to find your inner motivation to seek for new ideas on your own.”
Author: Bill Watterson

quote: “A birth-date is a reminder to celebrate the life as well as to update the life.”
Author: Amit Kalantri,

quote: “Do more listening than talking; talk more about them than about you.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “You can't hang around waiting for somebody else to pull your strings. Destiny's what you make of it. You have to face whatever life throws at you. And if it throws more than you'd like, more than you think you can handle? Well then you just have to find the heroism within yourself and play out the hand you've been dealt. The universe never sets a challenge that can't be met. You just need to believe in yourself in order to find the strength to face it.”
Author: Darren Shan,

quote: “Everything is within your power,
Author: Janice Trachtman,

quote: “What others think about you is none of your business.”
Author: Jack Canfield,

quote: “With a hint of good judgment, to fear nothing, not failure or suffering or even death, indicates that you value life the most. You live to the extreme; you push limits; you spend your time building legacies. Those do not die.”
Author: Criss Jami,

quote: “Perfection does not exist -- you can always do better and you can always grow.”
Author: Les Brown

quote: “Forgive yourself for your faults and your mistakes and move on.”
Author: Les Brown

quote: “Today, many will choose to live free of conditions and rules governing their own happiness. Why not you? Do not let another day go by where your dedication to other people's opinions is greater than your dedication to your own emotions! Today's a new day!”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Maybe I made a mistake yesterday, but yesterday’s me is still me. I am who I am today, with all my faults. Tomorrow I might be a tiny bit wiser, and that’s me, too. These faults and mistakes are what I am, making up the brightest stars in the constellation of my life. I have come to love myself for who I was, who I am, and who I hope to become.”
Author: Kim Namjoon

quote: “The power to change your life lies in the simplest of steps.”
Author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “لا يمكنك أن تُنجز شيئا إذا أعطيته نصف وقتك ولا يمكنك أن تحب شخصا إذا أعطيته نصف قلبك”
Author: ياسر حارب,

quote: “When you are lonely for a while don't get restless, if you had born alone, you are going to die alone then for sometime you can certainly live alone.”
Author: Amit Kalantri

quote: “Success is a poor teacher”
Author: Robert Kiyosaki,

quote: “We can’t help the way we’re born. We can’t help what we are, only what life we choose to make for ourselves.”
Author: Leigh Bardugo,

quote: “Protect your enthusiasm from the negativity and fear of others. Never decide to do nothing just because you can only do little. Do what you can. You would be surprised at what "little" acts have done for our world.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “You have the ability to choose your reactions.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “We can't undo a single thing we have ever done, but we can make decisions today that propel us to the life we want and towards the healing we need.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “You can't just wish change; you have to live the change in order for it to become a reality.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “She remembered who she was
Author: Lalah Delia

quote: “Reading the Bible will help you get to know the word, but it’s when you put it down and live your life that you get to know the author.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “A very small percentage of the people in this world will actually experience and live today. So many people will be stuck on another day, another time that traumatized them and caused them to spiritually stutter so they miss out on this day.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “I hope you find true meaning, contentment, and passion in your life. I hope you navigate the difficult times and come out with greater strength and resolve. I hope you find whatever balance you seek with your eyes wide open. And I hope that you - yes, you - have the ambition to lean in to your career and run the world. Because the world needs you to change it.”
Author: Sheryl Sandberg,

quote: “Be wise today so you don't cry tomorrow.”
Author: E.A. Bucchianeri

quote: “One word of encouragement can be enough to spark someone’s motivation to continue with a difficult challenge.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “If you want to find happiness, find gratitude.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Never allow your mind to wander untamed like a wild animal that exists on the basis of survival of the fittest. Tame your mind with consistent focus on your goals and desires.”
Author: Stephen Richards,

quote: “To assess the quality of thoughts of people, don't listen to their words, but watch their actions.”
Author: Amit Kalantri,

quote: “Grateful souls focus on the happiness and abundance present in their lives and this in turn attracts more abundance and joy towards them.”
Author: Stephen Richards,

quote: “Do it first and feel about it afterwards.' - Dagny Taggart”
Author: Ayn Rand,

quote: “When you start giving, instead of getting, you make a difference. You can always give a warm smile, a sincere hello, a positive vibe… your attention, your time, your love, and kindness to those around you.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Orang yang tidak pernah dibakar panas mentari, mustahil menghargai rimbun berteduh - peribahasa Turki.”
Author: Hasrizal Abdul Jamil,

quote: “Life is a balanced system of learning and evolution. Whether pleasure or pain; every situation in your life serves a purpose. It is up to us to recognize what that purpose could be.”
Author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “The difference between greed and ambition is a greedy person desires things he isn't prepared to work for.”
Author: Habeeb Akande

quote: “Manifesting is a lot like making a cake. The things needed are supplied by you, the mixing is done by your mind and the baking is done in the oven of the universe.”
Author: Stephen Richards,

quote: “It is not as much about who you used to be, as it is about who you choose to be.”
Author: Sanhita Baruah

quote: “Soar with wit. Conquer with dignity. Handle with care.”
Author: Criss Jami,

quote: “I will heighten my life by helping others heighten theirs”
Author: Les Brown,

quote: “Intelligence is more important than strength, that is why earth is ruled by men and not by animals.”
Author: Amit Kalantri,

quote: “No one rises to low expectations”
Author: Les Brown

quote: “Do you love yourself enough to BE what you love yourself enough to WANT?”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “‎By reacting from fear instead of responding from love, you inject poison directly into the veins of your relationship.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “One of the most healing things you can do is recognize where in your life you are your own poison.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Thank you, Mr. Secretary General, UNICEF Executive Director, Excellencies and distinguished guests from across the world.
Author: Kim Namjoon

quote: “You are the perfect creation of God. Don't allow you to be down. God is experiencing through you.”
Author: Amit Ray

quote: “It’s time to care; it’s time to take responsibility; it’s time to lead; it’s time for a change; it’s time to be true to our greatest self; it’s time to stop blaming others.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Judging is preventing us from understanding a new truth. Free yourself from the rules of old judgments and create the space for new understanding.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Don’t tell me about your god with your words. Show me about your god with your actions.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Fear can only grow in darkness. Once you face fear with light, you win.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “When I face the desolate impossibility of writing five hundred pages, a sick sense of failure falls on me, and I know I can never do it. Then gradually, I write one page and then another. One day's work is all I can permit myself to contemplate.”
Author: John Steinbeck,

quote: “Are you going to allow the world around you to change while you remain stagnant? Make this the time you throw away old habits that have hindered your happiness and success and finally allow your greatest self to flourish.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “How would your life be different if…You pretended those around you were deaf to your words? Let today be the day…You let your actions speak and communicate your feelings and intentions.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Life itself is simple...it's just not easy.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “You've been given the innate power to shape your life...but you cannot just speak change, you have to LIVE change. Intent paired with action builds the bridge to success. You can't just want it; you have to do it, live it...BE it! Success isn't something you have, it's something you DO!”
Author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “You are where you are right now because of the actions you've taken, or maybe, the inaction you've taken.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “It is better to find your courage to make changes when you can choose to rather than being forced to. If you do not make change, change will make you.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Think of the patience God has had for you and let it resonate to others. If you want a more patient world, let patience be your motto”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “The value of surrounding yourself with positive people is not what you get from them, but how good a person you have become because of them.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Everyone's time is limited. What matters most is to focus on what matters most.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Your life begins to change the day you take responsibility for it.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “How would your life be different if…You stopped focusing on what you didn’t want and started focusing on what you do want? Let today be the day…You establish a clear intent, make a plan, and take actions towards your intent.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “If you don’t know exactly where you’re going, how will you know when you get there?”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “The whole value of solitude depends upon oneself; it may be a sanctuary or a prison, a haven of repose or a place of punishment, a heaven or a hell, as we ourselves make it.”
Author: John Lubbock,

quote: “Scholars, theologians, and even poets have yet to be able to truly describe and touch upon the beauty, romance, and magic of a relationship built on 100% authenticity”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Therefore it is unnecessary for a prince to have all the good qualities I have enumerated, but it is very necessary to appear to have them. And I shall dare to say this also, that to have them and always to observe them is injurious, and that to appear to have them is useful; to appear merciful, faithful, humane, religious, upright, and to be so, but with a mind so framed that should you require not to be so, you may be able and know how to change to the opposite.”
Author: Niccolò Machiavelli,

quote: “Shoot for the moon. Even if you miss, you'll land among the stars.”
Author: Les Brown

quote: “You don't have to get it perfect, you just have to get it going. Babies don't walk the first time they try, but eventually they get it right”
Author: Jack Canfield

quote: “A smile is the best way to get oneself out of a tight spot, even if it is a fake one. Surprisingly enough, everyone takes it at face value. I read that in a book.
Author: Naruto Shippuden

quote: “Everyone of us needs to show how much we care for each other and, in the process, care for ourselves.”
Author: Princess Diana

quote: “A friend who is far away is sometimes much nearer than one who is at hand.”
Author: Les Brown

quote: “It is better to aim high and miss than to aim low and hit.”
Author: Les Brown

quote: “Politeness is the first thing people lose once they get the power.”
Author: Amit Kalantri,

quote: “When you are angry try your best to go to sleep, it keeps you away from speaking, writing and thinking while you are angry.”
Author: Amit Kalantri

quote: “Resources are hired to give results, not reasons.”
Author: Amit Kalantri,

quote: “Most people think the biggest sacrifice, the greates act of love you can give is to die for someone. And probably it is. But Sometimes it is the opposite. The biggest thing you can do for someone is to live.”
Author: Sarah Wylie,

quote: “I promise you nothing is as chaotic as it seems. Nothing is worth diminishing your health. Nothing is worth poisoning yourself into stress, anxiety, and fear.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “When you find yourself in need of spiritual nourishment, it is in the opportunities to serve others that you will find the abundance you seek.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Once you start recognizing the truth of your story, finish the story. It happened but you're still here, you're still capable, powerful, you're not your circumstance. It happened and you made it through. You're still fully equipped with every single tool you need to fulfill your purpose.”
Author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “The purpose of fear is to raise your awareness not to stop your progress.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Make the most of the best and the least of the worst.”
Author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: “When you do what you love, the seemingly impossible becomes simply challenging, the laborious becomes purposeful resistance, the difficult loses its edge and is trampled by your progress.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “You know you're doing what you love when Sunday nights feel the same as Friday nights....”
Author: Donny Deutsch,

quote: “Never say anything about yourself you don't want to come true”
Author: Brian Tracy

quote: “Although I deeply love oceans, deserts and other wild landscapes, it is only mountains that beckon me with that sort of painful magnetic pull to walk deeper and deeper into their beauty. They keep me continuously wanting to know more, feel more, see more.”
Author: Victoria Erickson

quote: “I may not be where I want to be but I'm thankful for not being where I used to be.”
Author: Habeeb Akande

quote: “NEVER be surprised by your own success!”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “We only live once. We all have an expiration date after that we will never come again. I am not saying that to make you sad. I am saying that so you can cherish each moment in your life and be grateful that you are here and you are Special”
Author: Pablo

quote: “The moment you become friends with your inner Self, you realize that the failures or hindrances that you met earlier were caused more by your disconnected status with your inner Being.”
Author: Stephen Richards,

quote: “The here and now is all we have, and if we play it right it's all we'll need.”
Author: Ann Richards

quote: “The value of a moment is immeasurable. The power of just ONE moment can propel you to success and happiness or chain you to failure and misery.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Your agreement with reality defines your life.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “I can’t think of anything more disheartening than living a life without a clear purpose.”
Author: Daniel Willey

quote: “Change is in the air. This change reminds us that we are made and beautifully sculpted by the same power that orchestrates the change of season. Let this be the season you embrace and align yourself with this change.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “I conclude therefore that, fortune being changeful and mankind steadfast in their ways, so long as the two are in agreement men are successful, but unsuccessful when they fall out. For my part I consider that it is better to be adventurous than cautious, because fortune is a woman, and if you wish to keep her under it is necessary to beat and ill-use her; and it is seen that she allows herself to be mastered by the adventurous rather than by those who go to work more coldly. She is, therefore, always, woman-like, a lover of young men, because they are less cautious, more violent, and with more audacity command her.”
Author: Niccolò Machiavelli,

quote: “If you intend to change, decide what you want and live your life accordingly.”
Author: Steve Maraboli ,

quote: “If you do whatever it takes to accomplish your goals to live the life you desire, It will be worth it. I promise! But if you find some excuse to justify quitting your journey, you will regret it. This is also a promise!" -gbb”
Author: Glenn Brandon Burke

quote: “Success is something you experience when you act accordingly. Success is not something you have, it's something you do.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “The best way to succeed is to have a specific Intent, a clear Vision, a plan of Action, and the ability to maintain Clarity. Those are the Four Pillars of Success. It never fails!”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “I do not care about happiness simply because I believe that joy is something worth fighting for.”
Author: Criss Jami,

quote: “But when your sword breaks, you draw your dagger.”
Author: C.S. Lewis,

quote: “People who don't see you every day have a hard time understanding how on some days--good days--you can run three miles, but can barely walk across the parking lot on other days,' [my mom] said quietly.”
Author: Jennifer Starzec,

quote: “Your feelings wouldn't get hurt if you were honest with yourself”
Author: Tye Lewis

quote: “You don't have to be great to get started but you have to get started to be great.”
Author: Les Brown

quote: “If you put yourself in a position where you have to stretch outside your comfort zone, then you are forced to expand your consciousness.”
Author: Les Brown

quote: “Kindness is universal. Sometimes being kind allows others to see the goodness in humanity through you. Always be kinder than necessary.”
Author: Germany Kent

quote: “Do not sabotage your new relationship with your last relationship’s poison.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “You can't learn in school what the world is going to do next year.”
Author: Henry Ford

quote: “Stop giving meaningless praise and start giving meaningful action.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “What is the point of being on this Earth if you are going to be like everyone else?”
Author: Arnold Schwarzenegger,

quote: “When we replace a sense of service and gratitude with a sense of entitlement and expectation, we quickly see the demise of our relationships, society, and economy.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Sometimes we forget about our own advantages because we focus on what we don't have. Just because you have to work a little harder at something that seems easier to others doesn't mean you're without your own talents.”
Author: Chris Colfer,

quote: “Stop allowing your day-to-day life to be clouded by busy nothingness.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Today is yours to shape. Create a masterpiece!”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Live your vision and demand your success.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “A person doesn't have to change who he is to become better.”
Author: Sidney Poitier,

quote: “Change is the parent of progress.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Free yourself from the complexities of your life! A life of simplicity and happiness awaits you.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Search for contentment in each person you meet.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Despite everything, it's still you.”
Author: Toby Fox

quote: “What do you think will be more effective when it comes to succeeding, believing you can or KNOWING you will? Let today be the last day you took timid steps of belief and start taking confident steps of purpose-driven knowing!”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “You are what you believe in. You become that which you believe you can become”
Author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: “The first place where self-esteem begins its journey is within us.”
Author: Stephen Richards,

quote: “Today stretches ahead of you waiting to be shaped. You are the sculptor who gets to do the shaping. What today will be like is up to you.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “When you establish a destination by defining what you want, then take physical action by making choices that move you towards that destination, the possibility for success is limitless and arrival at the destination is inevitable.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “I often wished that more people understood the invisible side of things. Even the people who seemed to understand, didn't really.”
Author: Jennifer Starzec,

quote: “Just because you're in a situation, doesn't mean you have to be that situation. You're not the situation you're in!”
Author: K.M. Johnson,

quote: “Never confuse someone else's inability to do something with its inability to be done.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “I hear you say 'Why?' Always 'Why?' You see things; and you say 'Why?' But I dream things that never were; and I say 'Why not?”
Author: George Bernard Shaw,

quote: “Your hopes, dreams and aspirations are legitimate. They are trying to take you airborne, above the clouds, above the storms, if you only let them.”
Author: William James

quote: “Success in life is not for those who run fast, but for those who keep running and always on the move.”
Author: Bangambiki Habyarimana,

quote: “If you get clear on the what, the how will be taken care of.”
Author: Jack Canfield,

quote: “Wanting something is not enough. You must hunger for it. Your motivation must be absolutely compelling in order to overcome the obstacles that will invariably come your way.”
Author: Les Brown

quote: “Superhuman effort isn't worth a damn unless it achieves results.”
Author: Ernest Shackleton

quote: “Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living out fears.”
Author: Les Brown

quote: “you don't have to be great to get started but you have to to get started to be great”
Author: Les Brown

quote: “Maturity is when you stop complaining and making excuses in your life; you realize everything that happens in life is a result of the previous choice you’ve made and start making new choices to change your life.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “How would your life be different if...You were conscious about the food you ate, the people you surround yourself with, and the media you watch, listen to, or read? Let today be the day...You pay attention to what you feed your mind, your body, and your life. Create a nourishing environment conducive to your growth and well-being today.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “The comfort zone is a psychological state in which one feels familiar, safe, at ease, and secure.
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “Learn from your history, but don’t live in it.”
Author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “You're never ready for what you have to do. You just do it. That makes you ready.”
Author: Flora Rheta Schreiber,

quote: “The only easy day was yesterday.”
Author: US Navy SEALs

quote: “Discipline your mind to see the good in every situation and look on the best side of every event.
Author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Create. Not for the money. Not for the fame. Not for the recognition. But for the pure joy of creating something and sharing it.”
Author: Ernest Barbaric

quote: “You cannot continue on the same path and arrive at a different destination. Make the choice to have your actions reflect your goals.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Whatever choice you make makes you. Choose wisely.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “The beginning is always NOW.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Your dream is a reality that is waiting for you to materialize. Today is a new day! Don’t let your history interfere with your destiny! Learn from your past so that it can empower your present and propel you to greatness”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Live Today! Do not allow your spirit to be softened of your happiness to be limited by a day you cannot have back or a day that does not yet exist.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Interrupt your thoughts of "I should", with your action of doing.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Dream big. Wake up. Take the first step into the unknown.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Sometimes you're drowning yourself in your own words.”
Author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “A lack of clarity could put the brakes on any journey to success.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,
