quote: “When you truly embrace your human impermanence you connect with the power you have, and influence you have, over the time you have.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “All my problems bow before my stubbornness.”
Author: Amit Kalantri,

quote: “Let today be the day you stop having conflict between your actions and your goals and finally align your greatest intent with your purposeful actions, creating a universal symphony serenading your success!”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Make a pact with yourself today to not be defined by your past. Instead, shake things up today! Live through today. Don’t just exist through it - LIVE through it!”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Live life with a purpose and live it full out.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “You need mountains, long staircases don't make good hikers.”
Author: Amit Kalantri,

quote: “As with all other aspects of the narrative art, you will improve with practice, but practice will never make you perfect. Why should it? What fun would that be?”
Author: Stephen King

quote: “It is not enough if you just live life as it comes to you like a floating leaf in a pond. Make use of the powers bestowed in you and soar like an eagle.”
Author: Stephen Richards,

quote: “أن تحاول مرارا لا يعني أنك غير قادر على النجاح بل يعني أنك غير قابل بالفشل”
Author: ياسر حارب,

quote: “There is no tomorrow and there was no yesterday; if you truly want to accomplish your goals you must engulf yourself in today.”
Author: Noel DeJesus

quote: “There's only one thing that will make them stop hating you. And that's being so good at what you do that they can't ignore you.”
Author: Orson Scott Card,

quote: “What would have become of Hercules do you think if there had been no lion, hydra, stag or boar - and no savage criminals to rid the world of? What would he have done in the absence of such challenges?
Author: Epictetus,

quote: “If you are going to be successful, you need to give up the phrase, "I can't" & all of its cousins, such as "I wish I were able to.”
Author: Jack Canfield,

quote: “Free yourself from the burden of feeling the need to hold on to anything. Let go… you are a part of everything.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Accepting personal responsibility for your life frees you from outside influences – increases your self-esteem – boosts confidence in your ability to decisions – and ultimately leads to achieve success in life.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “The price tag you put on yourself decides your worth. Underestimating yourself will cost you dearly.”
Author: Apoorve Dubey

quote: “التسامُحُ أجملُ أنواع النسيان”
Author: ياسر حارب,

quote: “Persistence is to the character of man as carbon is to steel.”
Author: Napoleon Hill

quote: “CONCERNED BUT NOT CONSUMED!”
Author: Ron Sanders

quote: “Although goals are important, having a plan of action is vital to the success of those goals. Having a goal with no plan of action is like wanting to travel to a new destination without having a map.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Start shaping your own day. Start walking your own walk. This journey is yours, take charge of it. Stop giving other people the power to shape your life.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “The road to success is always under construction.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Do not compromise yourself and put your goodness in the same impermanent category as whatever circumstance happening. Be the best you in every circumstance.”
Author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “If it is bread that you seek, you will have bread.
Author: Rumi

quote: “The lust for comfort kills the passions of the soul.”
Author: Khalil Gibran,

quote: “Too much action with too little intent makes for wasteful exertion of energy and the confusion between movement and progress.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Free yourself from the inauthenticity and disempowerment of your story.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Step out of your comfort zone. Comfort zones, where your unrealized dreams are buried, are the enemies of achievement. Leadership begins when you step outside your comfort zone.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Never run from the truth. It is always there; it never changes – save your energy.”
Author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “Success can be defined in many ways but failure in only one ... quitting!”
Author: Gerard de Marigny,

quote: “Don't be one of those who don't want others to be empowered. Share information. Try to make the next person, smarter.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Leave your excuses and live your dreams!”
Author: Paul F. Davis

quote: “No matter what the cause, God is only as willing as you are.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Action is the universal language of success.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “God didn’t give fear a body. God gave love a body.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Pride and power fall when the person falls, but discoveries of truth form legacies that can be built upon for generations.”
Author: Criss Jami,

quote: “A person today who seems to have a great sense of self-esteem has his or her childhood days to thank for it.”
Author: Stephen Richards,

quote: “I’ve learned that no matter how inspired, fired up and motivated you might be, the dark clouds will always set in”
Author: Bernard Kelvin Clive,

quote: “When you start something, make sure that you're willing to take the time to finish it right because, honey, the work you put into it will be more than worth it in the end. The best things always are.”
Author: C.M. Stunich,

quote: “The only thing wrong with trying to please everyone is that there's always at least one person who will remain unhappy. You.”
Author: Elizabeth Parker,

quote: “Despite what you may believe, you can disappoint people and still be good enough. You can make mistakes and still be capable and talented. You can let people down and still be worthwhile and deserving of love. Everyone has disappointed someone they care about. Everyone messes up, lets people down, and makes mistakes. Not because we’re inadequate or fundamentally inept, but because we’re imperfect and fundamentally human. Expecting anything different is setting yourself up for failure.”
Author: Daniell Koepke

quote: “You must take responsibility for removing I can't from your vocabulary.”
Author: Jack Canfield,

quote: “Being in home is like magic moments, in a magic world, among maicians”
Author: Durgesh Satpathy,

quote: “The greatest love stories are not those in which love is only spoken, but those in which it is acted upon.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Do not dilute the truth of your potential. We often convince ourselves that we cannot change, that we cannot overcome the circumstances of our lives. That is simply not true. You have been blessed with immeasurable power to make positive changes in your life. But you can't just wish it, you can't just hope it, you can't just want it... you have to LIVE it, BE it, DO it.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Without desires and dreams, your thoughts do not matter and you can think whatever you want to.”
Author: Stephen Richards,

quote: “Too often we underestimate the power of a touch, a smile, a kind word, a listening ear, an honest accomplishment, or the smallest act of caring, all of which have the potential to turn a life around.”
Author: Leo Buscaglia

quote: “It is a profound and necessary truth that the deep things in science are not found because they are useful; they are found because it was possible to find them.”
Author: Robert Oppenheimer

quote: “Write this down: My life is full of unlimited possibilities.”
Author: Pablo

quote: “Stop waiting for the right person to come into your life. Be the right person to come to someone’s life”
Author: Leo Babauta

quote: “What good has impatience ever brought? It has only served as the mother of mistakes and the father of irritation.”
Author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “If everyone is moving forward together, then success takes care of itself.”
Author: Henry Ford

quote: “The problem isn’t that I think so highly of myself. It is just that you think so little of yourself. Live life BIG, BOLD and OUT LOUD!”
Author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: “You don't have to be a hero to accomplish great things---to compete. You can just be an ordinary chap, sufficiently motivated to reach challenging goals.”
Author: Edmund Hillary,

quote: “Have you had a failure or rejection? You could get bitter. That's one way to deal with it. Or...you could just get BETTER. What do you think?”
Author: Destiny Booze

quote: “إذا أردت أن تتفاعل حقاً مع من تعاملهم ، يجب أن تفهمهم قبل أن تطلب منهم أن يفهموك”
Author: ستيفن كوفي,

quote: “We are mathematical equations where your life is the sum of all choices you've made until now. The good news is you can change the equation so that you start making a difference in your life.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “This moment is yours and yours alone! Take charge, seize this moment and allow it to propel you to the high levels of an empowered life. Allow upon this fertile moment to be planted the seeds of your happiness and success.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “A good self-esteem level is mostly dependant on how we value ourselves without any bias.”
Author: Stephen Richards,

quote: “Where we fall are the stepping-stones for our journey.”
Author: Lolly Daskal,

quote: “It's not what you've got, it's what you use that makes a difference.”
Author: Zig Ziglar

quote: “Your limits are somewhere up there, waiting for you to reach beyond infinity.”
Author: Arnold Henry

quote: “The people we consider successful in our society are all people that seize every moment and make the best of each situation.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “You are where you are and what you are because of yourself, nothing else. Nature is neutral. Nature doesn't care. If you do what other successful people do, you will enjoy the same results and rewards that they do. And if you don't, you won't.”
Author: Brian Tracy,

quote: “Once we open our eyes to the infinite magic that the universe has in abundance, we are sure to be enthralled by what we see and this miraculous creation gets us closer to our dreams and to the world as a whole.”
Author: Stephen Richards,

quote: “We have come here together so that you might know, through virtue of your own pain, your own hopelessness, your own fear, your own darkness and the lie of powerlessness, the very actual power of your own will, of the will of your soul.”
Author: Jennifer DeLucy

quote: “Let your action manifest your thought, your belief and your passion.”
Author: Mohammed Ali Bapir

quote: “Prepare yourself for success. You have to see it coming to get there.”
Author: Destiny Booze

quote: “People have boldness to criticize but not to sensitize.”
Author: Amit Kalantri

quote: “Be a worthy worker and work will come.”
Author: Amit Kalantri,

quote: “Great losses are great lessons.”
Author: Amit Kalantri,

quote: “It will be better to spent our energy on reality; the tangible facts, not thoughts of the past.”
Author: Durgesh Satpathy,

quote: “If you can't be brave, be determined. And you'll end up in the same place.”
Author: Lisa Scottoline,

quote: “You don't have to be good at something to be liked.”
Author: Stephen Richards

quote: “Every sunrise is priceless and you can experience the richness that life holds only when you live life to the full instead of just being an onlooker.”
Author: Stephen Richards,

quote: “The more you can have control over your ego rather than let it run amuck, the more successful you’ll be in all areas of life.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “How would your life be different if...you began each day by thanking someone who has helped you? Let today be the day...You make it a point to show your gratitude to others. Send a letter or card, make a call, send a text or email, tell them in person...do whatever you have to do to let them know you appreciate them.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Life’s a marathon, not a sprint.”
Author: Phillip C. McGraw

quote: “Every challenge you encounter in life is a fork in the road. You have the choice to choose which way to go - backward, forward, breakdown or breakthrough.”
Author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha,

quote: “The most dangerous irony is, people are angry with others because of their own incompetence.”
Author: Amit Kalantri,

quote: “There has never been a meaningful life built on easy street.”
Author: John Paul warren

quote: “If at first you don’t succeed, you’re doing it wrong. Learn from the experience. Try again, but with a different approach.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “When you are just EXISTING, life happens to you… and you manage; when you are truly LIVING, you happen to life… and you lead.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Prepared for the worst,but still praying for the best”
Author: Lil Wayne

quote: “If you always do what you've always done, you'll always get what you always got.”
Author: James P. Lewis,

quote: “لا تَقُل لي ما اسْمُك وقُل لي ما إنجازك فالإنجازات تصنع الأسماء”
Author: ياسر حارب,

quote: “When the going gets tough, the tough get going”
Author: Billy Joel

quote: “It is important that when we make a resolution, or establish a goal, that we take the ACTION necessary to accomplish that goal.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Everything is easier said than done. Wanting something is easy. Saying something is easy. The challenge and the reward are in the doing.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Once you feel nice about yourself, you have planted the first seed to develop self-confidence.”
Author: Stephen Richards,

quote: “But if we are talking in terms of making progress in life, we must understand that "good enough" is very different from "best.”
Author: Paulo Coelho,

quote: “Take care of your costume and your confidence will take care of itself.”
Author: Amit Kalantri,

quote: “The job of feets is walking, but their hobby is dancing.”
Author: Amit Kalantri,

quote: “الفاشلون يتحدثون عن آلامهم والناجحون يتحدثون عن آمالهم”
Author: ياسر حارب,

quote: “Time waits for no one.”
Author: The Girl Who Leapt Through Time

quote: “The purpose of empowerment is to urge you towards freedom, to help each of you to break free of all limitations. It is that freedom that will give you eternal happiness and finally connect you with the unconditional realization of TRUTH.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “I prefer to be on the side of losers, the misunderstood or lonely people rather than writing about the strong and powerful.”
Author: Núria Añó

quote: “The mind can't delete what the heart won't let go of.”
Author: Peggy Toney Horton,

quote: “You can only work on yourself. Start there.”
Author: Alice O. Howell

quote: “Something hit me very hard once, thinking about what one little man could do. Think of the Queen Mary — the whole ship goes by and then comes the rudder. And there's a tiny thing at the edge of the rudder called a trimtab.
Author: R. Buckminster Fuller

quote: “I can’t help you, I can only guide you, and you are the one who can help yourself.”
Author: Durgesh Satpathy,

quote: “Whatever your calling, it's already rooted within you, and those roots can be trampled or tugged at but never removed. They grow stronger only when tended, nurtured, and most important, shared with others.”
Author: Oprah Winfrey,

quote: “You can't keep dancing with the devil and ask why you're still in hell.”
Author: Kynna Claire

quote: “The realisation that limitations are imaginary will make you strong and overpowering.”
Author: Stephen Richards,

quote: “We are exactly what our history made us to be.”
Author: Stephen Richards,

quote: “How would your life be different if...You decided to give freely, love fully, and play feverously? Let today be the day...You free yourself from the conditioned rules that limit your happiness and dilute the beautiful life experience. Have fun. Give - Love - Play!”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “I have realized that whatever good comes to me, comes from God, whatever bad comes to me, God has allowed it, and I choose to be thankful for both.”
Author: Jeff Goins,

quote: “Self-confidence is contagious.”
Author: Stephen Richards

quote: “Let today be the day that you become committed in being, in doing, in getting, achieving, in experiencing. Let today be the day that you are committed to being the change you wish to see and living the life you wish to live.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “لن يفشل أبدا كل انسان يحاول”
Author: أنيس منصور,

quote: “Luck is a word the bitter teach to the ignorant.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Notice the difference between being in control and needing control.”
Author: Marilyn Suttle

quote: “I must admit, that I have learned more from my negative experiences than I have ever learned from my positive one.”
Author: John Paul Warren

quote: “Don't use yesterday's state of mind, to make today's decision.”
Author: C. Nzingha Smith,

quote: “Your circumstances do NOT define you. Expect a GRAND finale.”
Author: John Paul Warren

quote: “If you have to ask if you’ve done enough, you haven’t. Each day brings with it the opportunity to do more than you did yesterday.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “With one kind gesture you can change a life. One person at a time you can change the world. One day at a time we can change everything.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Faith UP! Your purpose is GREATER than all your PROBLEMS.”
Author: John Paul Warren

quote: “The future is greatly different than your life now, the actions that you take must also be greatly different. You cannot do the same thing and get something different.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Intent without dedicated action is simply not enough. Action without a clear intent is a waste. It is when these two powerful forces are aligned that the energy of the universe conspires in your favor.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Each day gives the opportunity for you to be treated right, to feel worthy, and to be successful. It’s a choice you have to make, a faith you have to embrace, and a standard you have to set.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “You are the point of origin for everything in your world: you set the standard for yourself.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “When someone who is suffering looks to you for compassion, it's indeed a blessing; you are chosen to be their Light in a moment of sorrow.”
Author: Michelle D. Rosado

quote: “The time has come to harness the blessed power within us and to use it to transcend from our current existence into a more empowered reality.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “I would rather live short and right then long and wrong.”
Author: John Paul Warren

quote: “We need more than just the Law of Attraction. We need to connect with its more successful twin, the Law of Generosity. And further entwine ourselves with their parent; the Law of Love.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Fear has the role we give it. We are able to empower or poison ourselves to whatever degree we want. This is the beauty of our design.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “You‘ve been given the innate power to shape your life.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “There are two things essential if you want to enhance your Jedi self-confidence:
Author: Stephen Richards,

quote: “The face is the mirror of the mind, and eyes without speaking confess the secrets of the heart.”
Author: Saint Jerome

quote: “You would not be here TODAY if YESTERDAY was your defining moment. LIVE THIS DAY and move towards your dreams.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Every great leader can take you back to a defining moment when they decided to lead”
Author: John Paul Warren

quote: “The only way you're going to reach places you've never gone is if you trust God's direction to do things you've never done.”
Author: Germany Kent

quote: “Yet how hard most people work for mere dust and ashes and care, taking no thought of growing in knowledge and grace, never having time to get in sight of their own ignorance.”
Author: John Muir,

quote: “Sometimes we have to soak ourselves in the tears and fears of the past to water our future gardens.”
Author: Suzy Kassem,

quote: “You be as angry as you need to be," she said. "Don't let anyone tell you otherwise. Not your grandma, not your dad, no one. And if you need to break things, then by God, you break them good and hard.
Author: Patrick Ness,

quote: “The difference between being mediocre and achieving excellence is you.”
Author: Stephen Richards,

quote: “A real decision is measured by the fact that you've taken a new action. If there's no action, you haven't truly decided.”
Author: Anthony Robbins,

quote: “A failure is always in the passenger seat in his or her life.”
Author: Stephen Richards,

quote: “Pursue your goal. Opinions be damned.”
Author: Stacy Verdick Case

quote: “At any given point you can release your greatest self. Don’t let anyone hold you back. Don’t let anyone dilute you. Don’t be peer pressured into being less than you are. People willing to dilute themselves for the sake of others is one of the great tragedies of our time. Stop letting others define and set the pace for your life. Get out there and be your best. Do your best. Live your best. Make every day count and you’ll see how exponentially more exciting, thrilling, successful, happy and full your life will be.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Until one is committed there is hesitancy, the chance to draw back, always ineffectiveness. Concerning all acts of initative or creation, there is one elementary truth...that the moment one definitely commits oneself, then Providence moves. too. All sorts of things occur to help one that would otherwise never have occurred. A whole stream of events issues from the decision, raising in ones's favor all manner of incidents and meetings and material assistance which no man would have believed would have come his way.
Author: W.H. Murray The Scottish Himalayan Expedition

quote: “All worries are less with wine.”
Author: Amit Kalantri,

quote: “How many of us stop short of success on purpose? How many of us sabotage our own happiness because failure, while miserable, is a fear we're familiar with? Success, however, dreams come true, are a whole new kind of terrifying, an entire new species of responsibilities and disillusions, requiring a new way to think, act and become. Why do we REALLY quit? Because it's hopeless? Or because it's possible...”
Author: Jennifer DeLucy

quote: “If you don't make the time to work on creating the life you want, you're eventually going to be forced to spend a LOT of time dealing with a life you don't want.”
Author: Kevin Ngo,

quote: “A Master Jedi feels emotions, but they do not allow them to influence their reasoning. Yoda told Luke that he would know the good from the bad when he was 'calm, at peace.”
Author: Stephen Richards,

quote: “The difference between those who adapted and those who didn't, Gorton said, was a willingness to totally commit.”
Author: Arnold Schwarzenegger,

quote: “You will never get everything in life but you will get enough.”
Author: Sanhita Baruah

quote: “Certain situations need a Jedi-like approach. One of these is when you are in a strange environment, usually where you feel unsure of yourself. You would be surprised how, if you walk with confidence and meaning, people will see this as a mark of confidence, yet you are perhaps shaking inside but outwardly you have the gait of a confident Jedi Knight.”
Author: Stephen Richards,

quote: “We need to send our words out in the direction we want them to go. In other words, we need to start talking victory when we’re staring at defeat. We need to start talking healing when we’re feeling sick. We need to start blessing and prosperity when we don’t have anything. We need to speak about marching when we feel like quitting.”
Author: Jentezen Franklin,

quote: “It's not always what we don't know that gets in our way; sometimes it's what we think we know that keeps us from learning.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “When in doubt, throw doubt out and have a little faith....”
Author: E.A. Bucchianeri,

quote: “Love is perhaps the only emotions that is boundless”
Author: Santosh Avvannavar,

quote: “If the painter wishes to see beauties that charm him, it lies in his power to create them, and if he wishes to see monstrosities that are frightful, ridiculous, or truly pitiable, he is lord and God thereof.”
Author: Leonardo da Vinci,

quote: “ننامُ كثيرا أفلا نحلمُ قليلا”
Author: ياسر حارب,

quote: “Music shouldn't be just a tune, it should be a touch.”
Author: Amit Kalantri,

quote: “Uncertainty will always be part of the taking charge process.”
Author: Harold Geneen

quote: “To be happy, you have to risk being unhappy.”
Author: Ogwo David Emenike,

quote: “One often has to do what they have to do in order to do what they want to do; however if you only do what you want to do then you will never do what you have to do!”
Author: Dr. C. Moorer,

quote: “Never stop acquiring the commonsense, it is as good as the knowledge.”
Author: Amit Kalantri

quote: “Remember diamonds are created under pressure so hold on, it will be your time to shine soon.”
Author: Sope Agbelusi

quote: “Like love, like talent, like any other virtue, like anything else in this life, happiness needs to be nurtured - this is the truth of the whole matter.”
Author: Ogwo David Emenike,

quote: “Jedi act with confidence, move with confidence, and breathe with confidence. Jedi possess a confident calmness in their looks, attitude and
Author: Stephen Richards

quote: “The power behind taking responsibility for your actions lies in putting an end to negative thought patterns. You no longer dwell on what went wrong or focus on whom you are going to blame. You don't waste time building roadblocks to your success. Instead, you are set free and can now focus on succeeding.”
Author: Lorii Myers

quote: “Positive belief in yourself will give you the energy needed to conquer the world and this belief is the power behind all creation.”
Author: Stephen Richards,

quote: “A mind of moderate capacity which closely pursues one study must infallibly arrive at great proficiency in that study.”
Author: Mary Shelley,

quote: “Believe with all your heart that you will do what you were made to do.”
Author: Orison Swett Marden

quote: “Changes are inevitable and not always controllable. What can be controlled is how you manage, react to and work through the change process.”
Author: Kelly A. Morgan

quote: “Do the things you used to talk about doing but never did. Know when to let go and when to hold on tight. Stop rushing. Don't be intimidated to say it like it is. Stop apologizing all the time. Learn to say no, so your yes has some oomph. Spend time with the friends who lift you up, and cut loose the ones who bring you down. Stop giving your power away. Be more concerned with being interested than being interesting. Be old enough to appreciate your freedom, and young enough to enjoy it. Finally know who you are.”
Author: Kristin Armstrong

quote: “A true dreamer is one who knows how to navigate in the dark”.”
Author: John Paul Warren

quote: “Though money cannot acquire you happiness, it does not mean that both money and happiness cannot exist together.”
Author: Stephen Richards,

quote: “Perseverance is the act of true role models and heroes.”
Author: Liza Wiemer

quote: “You have had a dream for so many years. Let today be the day you make a plan for it. Just think about how much more likely you are to hit your target when you finally aim at it.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Winning is great, but if it's not enough then then you'll never have enough!”
Author: Stephen Richards

quote: “Whatever belief we have actually stems from the thankfulness that we feel and this feeling further attracts more happy feelings towards us.”
Author: Stephen Richards,

quote: “Once you figure out what you want in life—expect nothing less.”
Author: Lorii Myers,

quote: “Once you understand how powerful you are within, you exponentially increase the power and potentiality of everything outside of you.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “When something poses as obstacle to you,surmount it and use it as a miracle to move on to greater height.”
Author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha,

quote: “The madder it makes you, the harder you need to laugh at it.”
Author: Destiny Booze

quote: “Dear Fellow Human Being,
Author: Jasz  Gill

quote: “Your self-confidence is simply the part of your brain that tells you whether or not you should try something different or new or believe in yourself, and just as a Jedi truly believes that it is within their power to control their thoughts and stay in the Light, so can you.”
Author: Stephen Richards,

quote: “We can’t continuously be a society of well-wishers. We must take action to bring those wishes to fruition.”
Author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “أعْجَزُ الناس المتشائمون وأقلّهم حظاً أقلّهم أملا”
Author: ياسر حارب,

quote: “Do the best you can, with what you can, while you can, and success in inevitable.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “How would your life be different if...You could control the outcome of your day, your week, your year? Let today be the day...You embrace the truth that you DO have such control to label every event in your life, and create an agreement with reality that empowers you and propels you to greatness.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “One should measure their life by the faith they embrace and the relationships they cherish”
Author: John Paul Warren

quote: “You’ve got one life, one shot, and all the power to make it happen. Get ready to dream big and live big. It’s all up to you. And it starts now.”
Author: Jolene Stockman,

quote: “In the face of adversity, we have a choice.
Author: Caryn Sullivan,

quote: “المبدعون لا يُبهروننا فقط ولكنهم يمنحوننا الأمل ويُجددون الطاقات المكبوتة بداخلنا فَهُم الشموع التي تُبدد الظلام ولا تلعنه”
Author: ياسر حارب,

quote: “Success is something you experience when you act accordingly. Success is not something you have, it’s something you do.”
Author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “For self-educated scientists and thinkers such as Charles Darwin, Srinivasa Ramanujan, Leonardo-da-Vinci, Michael Faraday, myself and many others, education is a relentless voyage of discovery. To us education is an everlasting quest for knowledge and wisdom.”
Author: Abhijit Naskar,

quote: “Recovery is full of ups and downs.
Author: Brittany Burgunder

quote: “Always have a 'Plan C”
Author: Zoltan Andrejkovics,

quote: “In traveling, a companion, in life, compassion,'" she repeats, making sure of it. If she had paper and pencil, it wouldn't surprise me if she wrote it down. "So what does that really mean? In simple terms.
Author: Haruki Murakami,

quote: “Never underestimate the power you have to take your life in a new direction.”
Author: Germany Kent

quote: “The world is my church. My actions are my prayer. My behavior is my creed.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “A barrier is a limitation only when you perceive it as one.”
Author: Stephen Richards,

quote: “I have learned that the harder you fall…the higher you bounce!”
Author: John Paul Warren

quote: “Today, you have the opportunity to transcend from a disempowered mindset of existence to an empowered reality of purpose-driven living. Today is a new day that has been handed to you for shaping. You have the tools, now get out there and create a masterpiece.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Have faith in the universe and its capability to lead you to the path of abundance.”
Author: Stephen Richards,

quote: “A great dread fell on him, as if he was awaiting the pronouncement of some doom that he had long foreseen and vainly hoped might after all never be spoken. An overwhelming longing to rest and remain at peace by Bilbo's side in Rivendell filled all his heart. At last with an effort he spoke, and wondered to hear his own words, as if some other will was using his small voice.
Author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quote: “الانشغال بالألم هو توقّفٌ مؤقَتٌ عن الحياة وهو إقحامٌ ساذج للعجز في عقولنا والعظماء فقط من يرون في الألم أكبر دافع للمقاومة”
Author: ياسر حارب,

quote: “Pain? Yes, of course. Racing without pain is not racing. But the pleasure of being ahead outweighed the pain a million times over. To hell with the pain. What's six minutes of pain compared to the pain they're going to feel for the next six months or six decades. You never forget your wins and losses in this sport. YOU NEVER FORGET.”
Author: Brad Alan Lewis,

quote: “Coming to the END of MYSELF and all SELF effort...seems to be the very point that God steps in and shows HIMSELF to be more than ENOUGH.”
Author: John Paul Warren

quote: “A story meant to motivate all and sundry irrespective of their circumstances”
Author: Santosh Avvannavar,

quote: “Most people know the physical senses, but a lot of people don’t know the soul’s senses: empathy, trust, intuition, love and harmony”
Author: Steven Aitchison

quote: “I want every girl in the world to pick up a guitar and start screaming.”
Author: Courtney Love

quote: “On the other hand, if the future is not the one you chose then you may have to use your willpower to obtain the future of your liking.”
Author: Stephen Richards,

quote: “Choice forms the divider which is responsible for the formation of all futures that can be possible.”
Author: Stephen Richards,

quote: “It is in the balancing of your spirituality with your humanity that you will find immeasurable happiness, success, good health, and love.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Forgive to forget, do not forget to forgive”
Author: Santosh Avvannavar,

quote: “قد لا يفارقك الألم ولكنك تستطيع أن تفارقه”
Author: ياسر حارب,

quote: “An empowered life begins with serious personal questions about oneself. Those answers bare the seeds of success.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “If the world is a book, are you the hero, or just a walk-on part?”
Author: K.J. Parker,

quote: “One thing I have learned from many years of watching my father is that some people, the best ones, are motivated more by the chance to prove themselves than by a command to serve. It is the work itself that calls them onward, especially if they believe they are the only ones who can do it.”
Author: Rae Carson,

quote: “A cord that remains, always. in many ways...”
Author: Santosh Avvannavar

quote: “When life's got you down, keep your head up... you can't see the ground anyway”
Author: Nicole  Rae

quote: “If you won’t trust yourself, nobody else will.”
Author: Anamika Mishra

quote: “Don't get too deep, it leads to over thinking, and over thinking leads to problems that don't even exist in the first place.”
Author: Jayson Engay

quote: “Let them be what they want to be. Make yourselves what you want to be.”
Author: Harshvardhan Malpani

quote: “God can take the ordinary and create the extraordinary. Our incredible God has the power to transform your simple life and give you the life of your dreams. Remarkable things happen in your life when you believe.”
Author: Amaka Imani Nkosazana,

quote: “War is not just the shower of bullets and bombs from both sides, it is also the shower of blood and bones on both sides.”
Author: Amit Kalantri,

quote: “A farmer is a magician who produces money from the mud.”
Author: Amit Kalantri,

quote: “Don't be distracted by criticism. Remember ~ the only taste of success some people have is when they take a bite out of you.”
Author: Zig Ziglar

quote: “If you want your prayers answered, get up off your knees and do something about them.”
Author: Wally Lamb,

quote: “Strength wasn‘t about being able to do everything alone. Strength was knowing when to ask for help and not being too proud to do it.”
Author: Karen Marie Moning,

quote: “To become a master at any skill, it takes the total effort of your: heart, mind, and soul working together in tandem.”
Author: Maurice Young

quote: “What we perceive about ourselves is greatly a reflection of how we will end up living our lives.”
Author: Stephen Richards,

quote: “Stop comparing yourself with others. If they are good at something, you too are good at something else. Self-confidence is not measured by your own capabilities versus that of others, but by your own needs.”
Author: Stephen Richards,

quote: “Yawns are not the only infectious things out there besides germs.
Author: Vera Nazarian

quote: “What if I told you 10 years from now your life would be exactly the same?
Author: Karen Salmansohn

quote: “Concentrate more on your achievements than your failures. Learn to take the failures as opportunities to rectify your errors.”
Author: Stephen Richards,

quote: “Each person has got a voice inside them. Communicate with it and take hold of it. Do not let it push and shove you around – you are its master!”
Author: Stephen Richards,

quote: “You’re only responsible for yourself, Jess. And that’s the only person you can control. Other people will either get it or they won’t but you can’t define yourself by their opinions.”
Author: Susan Mallery,

quote: “How we relate with other people is dependent on how we rate ourselves and what we think about ourselves.”
Author: Stephen Richards,

quote: “If life throws you a few bad notes or vibrations, don't let them interrupt or alter your song.”
Author: Suzy Kassem,

quote: “Failures can be called ‘strengtheners’ as they make you determined to reach your goal with the lessons they teach.”
Author: Stephen Richards,

quote: “Always make your future bigger than your past.”
Author: Dan Sullivan,

quote: “Nothing that happens to you was meant to be. The only thing about you that was meant to be is you. Blaze your own trail.”
Author: George Alexiou

quote: “Have nuts and be nuts.”
Author: Criss Jami,

quote: “According to the Law of Attraction, the physical reality that you experience at present is drawn towards the future probability you desired when it attains more power.”
Author: Stephen Richards,

quote: “I may not be where I want to be, but if I stop now, I'll NEVER get where I'm going!”
Author: Laura  Lynch,

quote: “Our own self-esteem is something we can actually twist in whatever way we want.”
Author: Stephen Richards,

quote: “Self-belief, also called self-efficacy, is the kind of feeling you have when you have, like a Jedi, mastered a particular kind of skill and with its help have been able to achieve your set goals.”
Author: Stephen Richards,

quote: “We've also evolved the ability to simply 'pay it forward': I help you, somebody else will help me. I remember hearing a parable when I was younger, about a father who lifts his young son onto his back to carry him across a flooding river. 'When I am older,' said the boy to his father, 'I will carry you across this river as you now do for me.' 'No, you won't,' said the father stoically. 'When you are older you will have your own concerns. All I expect is that one day you will carry your own son across this river as I no do for you.' Cultivating this attitude is an important part of Humanism--to realize that life without God can be much more than a series of strict tit-for-tat transactions where you pay me and I pay you back. Learning to pay it forward can add a tremendous sense of meaning and dignity to our lives. Simply put, it feels good to give to others, whether we get back or not.”
Author: Greg Epstein,

quote: “Without adversity, there would be no growth, and without growth, there would be no lesson to be learned.”
Author: Michelle D. Rosado,

quote: “إن من يُحب يُهدي ومن يُهدي يحب وخير هدية هو الحب ذاته، فهو البقاء بعد الرحيل وهو الحياة بعد الموت وهو الكلمة التي لا تحتاج إلى قاموس”
Author: ياسر حارب,

quote: “Going down in history is a dead end pursuit”
Author: Benny Bellamacina

quote: “There is no real world, just the one you create.”
Author: Jolene Stockman,

quote: “In the spiritual world many forms of the physical universe that are potentially effective can be perceived but with regard to time, we can observe only one form.”
Author: Stephen Richards,

quote: “All my life I've been fascinated by the precipice in all of us. When you come to it, you either choose to fall or you don’t --Alvin Ailey”
Author: Kathy Petrakis,

quote: “What if not just women, but both men and women, worked smart, more flexible schedules? What if the workplace itself was more fluid than the rigid and narrow ladder to success of the ideal worker? And what if both men and women became responsible for raising children and managing the home, sharing work, love, and play? Could everyone then live whole lives?”
Author: Brigid Schulte,

quote: “If your failure is not a lesson, it's indeed a failure.”
Author: Ogwo David Emenike,

quote: “If the fire in your heart is strong enough, it will burn away any obstacles that come your way.”
Author: Suzy Kassem,

quote: “Then holding the star aloft and the bright sword advanced, Frodo, hobbit of the Shire, walked steadily down to meet the eyes.”
Author: J.R.R. Tolkien,

quote: “Taking the decision-making process away from people disempowers them. It also makes them much less likely to buy into the decision, however right it may be. One’s own conscience remains the ultimate arbiter.”
Author: Lama Surya Das

quote: “Reconnect with the highest truth and ignite the divine sparks in you.”
Author: Amit Ray,

quote: “Some of the most powerful speeches I have given have been delivered in the dedicated silence of my actions.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Similar to a butterfly, I've gone through a metamorphosis, been released from my dark cocoon, embraced my wings, and soared!”
Author: Dana Arcuri,

quote: “But confining myself more to the particular, I say that a prince may be seen happy to-day and ruined to-morrow without having shown any change of disposition or character. This, I believe, arises firstly from causes that have already been discussed at length, namely, that the prince who relies entirely upon fortune is lost when it changes. I believe also that he will be successful who directs his actions according to the spirit of the times, and that he whose actions do not accord with the times will not be successful. Because men are seen, in affairs that lead to the end which every man has before him, namely, glory and riches, to get there by various methods; one with caution, another with haste; one by force, another by skill; one by patience, another by its opposite; and each one succeeds in reaching the goal by a different method. One can also see of two cautious men the one attain his end, the other fail; and similarly, two men by different observances are equally successful, the one being cautious, the other impetuous; all this arises from nothing else than whether or not they conform in their methods to the spirit of the times. This follows from what I have said, that two men working differently bring about the same effect, and of two working similarly, one attains his object and the other does not.”
Author: Niccolò Machiavelli,

quote: “Formal education and current position can define your worthiness. What makes you extraordinary is defined by your attitude towards others.”
Author: Ashish Patel

quote: “Five years from today, you will be the same person that you are today, except for the books you read and the people you meet.”
Author: Charlie "Tremendous" Jones

quote: “I don't give up. That makes me incredibly resilient or maybe stupid or just plain stubborn. Whichever...”
Author: Destiny Booze

quote: “The greatest Emotion is Love.
Author: pablo

quote: “Leave that room, kid. Shut the screen off. Take your dirty shoes, not the pretty ones, and go out to feel the wind. Touch water. Touch earth. Touch wood, touch skin, touch everything you can touch and memorise everything because that’s all you will live off in the end, and that’s all you will need.”
Author: Charlotte Eriksson,

quote: “أحط نفسك تدريجيا بفريق من الطراز الأول من الأشخاص الذين سيجعلون حياتك بهيجة و سعيدة و غنية إلى أبعد حد. ابدأ على الفور ،،”
Author: Jack Canfield,

quote: “Do you know where your breakthrough begins? Your breakthrough begins where your excuses ends.”
Author: Patience Johnson,

quote: “One of the Secrets in Life is to Make Stepping Stones out of Stumbling Blocks.”
Author: Jack Penn

quote: “Be mindful of the link between action and outcome. Ask yourself: If I repeat today's action 365 times, will I be where I want to be in a year?”
Author: Guideposts Magazine

quote: “For that reason, let a prince have the credit of conquering and holding his state, the means will always be considered honest, and he will be praised by everybody because the vulgar are always taken by what a thing seems to be and by what comes of it; and in the world there are only the vulgar, for the few find a place there only when the many have no ground to rest on.”
Author: Niccolò Machiavelli,

quote: “what if I fall? oh, my darling, but if you fly?”
Author: Erin Hanson

quote: “ليس بالضرورة أن تكون عظيما لكي تحلم ولكن عليك أن تحلم لكي تكون عظيما”
Author: ياسر حارب,

quote: “Father has a strengthening character like the sun and mother has a soothing temper like the moon.”
Author: Amit Kalantri,

quote: “Train up a child in such a way she or he should go; even when she or he is old she or he will not depart' Proverb”
Author: Santosh Avvannavar,

quote: “Do not allow hate to take root in your heart.”
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: “Leaders in OVER their heads is the mere result of getting ahead of their intended SEASON.”
Author: John Paul Warren

quote: “The word "seek" is a verb. Are you treating it as such in your life? If you seek change, success, or love, DO it - BE it!”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Life would have been beautiful if there weren't any problems.”
Author: Santosh Avvannavar,

quote: “We often fail to see that there is an invisible wall in a relationship - Cord 10, In Between Us!”
Author: Santosh Avvannavar

quote: “How would your life be different if...you had a plan of action towards your goals? Let today be the day...You stop allowing your days to be stolen by busy nothingness and take calculated steps towards your goals.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “People often try to distinguish between personal and professional life, but they end failing - Cord 8 : Are we Computers?”
Author: Santosh Avvannavar

quote: “A champion is someone who gets up when he can't.”
Author: Jack Dempsey

quote: “Your only limitations are the ties you allow to bind you.”
Author: Saundra Dalton-Smith,

quote: “Never let the opinion of another affect your opinion of yourself.”
Author: Teresa Mummert

quote: “Encourage, lift and strengthen one another. For the positive energy spread to one will be felt by us all. For we are connected, one and all.”
Author: Deborah Day

quote: “Always strive to aim for the highest peak of the goals in life you have set, this way if you manage to reach even half way toward a goal, landing in the middle is not such a bad place to end up.”
Author: Victoria Addino

quote: “Someone needs to fight, someone needs to sacrifice, someone needs to inspire, someone needs to be a hero.”
Author: Amit Kalantri,

quote: “To embark on the journey towards your goals and dreams requires bravery. To remain on that path requires courage. The bridge that merges the two is commitment.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Success is a decision, not a gift.”
Author: Steve Backley,

quote: “If you take any step, no matter how small it is, towards achieving your dreams then you will surely find the right path and reach the abundance that lies in store for you.”
Author: Stephen Richards,

quote: “With every challenge you face, there is an opportunity hidden that will lead you towards the path of wealth and abundance.”
Author: Stephen Richards,

quote: “Limitations are like mirages created by your own mind. When you realise that limitation do not exist, those around you will also feel it and allow you inside their space.”
Author: Stephen Richards,

quote: “Your core, lying deep within you, is what makes you what you are. Some call it the soul, the Higher Self, the true self, the being and so on. The name is unimportant once you realize that you are more than your looks and outward appearance.”
Author: Stephen Richards,

quote: “If someone does not consider those around them to be valuable and hold only themselves in high regard, they too have a very bad self-esteem.”
Author: Stephen Richards,

quote: “When you are drowned by your sorry state, and you feel as if you are carried away from the road that leads to your desires, you should know that you are the one responsible for being led away from the right path.”
Author: Stephen Richards,

quote: “The power of hope! Even a lack of ambition can, for a time, pay off as a necessary facet, as long as hope outweighs it.”
Author: Criss Jami,

quote: “Love' is the only weapon I have, I will defend with love, I will attack with love.”
Author: Amit Kalantri

quote: “Get out of your own way… stop the paralysis by analysis… decide what you want, create a simple plan, and get moving!”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Jedi are always assessing situations, actions and possibilities. Jedi don’t just think outside of the box with the help from the Force, they also adapt to situations outside of the box!”
Author: Stephen Richards,

quote: “In reality there are no limitations. They are vibrant and changeable to whatever form you want them to take to realise your goals.”
Author: Stephen Richards,

quote: “Jedi are conversationalists and negotiators, bringing people together and solving problems. Jedi listen and feel to what others are saying.”
Author: Stephen Richards,

quote: “The gratitude that you feel leads to faith in the abundance and with every resonance that radiates from your mind more strong feelings of faith start to reside in you.”
Author: Stephen Richards,

quote: “The Jedi is a practitioner of mind mastery. He realizes that whatever they are experiencing, they are creating and that they can change their lives in an instant by changing their thoughts, their focus and the way they are observing and engaging the energy of the world around them and the people who they’ve invited into their lives to play whatever roles they’ve chosen them to play.”
Author: Stephen Richards,

quote: “Gone are the days when 19-inch biceps would once command respect. A Jedi doesn’t walk around with their arms flexed and with a thousand yard stare in their eyes. They walk with a good posture, their head held high and with a serious, yet friendly, look on their face.”
Author: Stephen Richards,

quote: “Humans, unlike Jedi, are powerfully afraid of rejection. We do not survive well alone, so humans as a species are especially vulnerable to thoughts that make us afraid the rest of the “tribe” will desert us to die a sad, lonely death.”
Author: Stephen Richards,

quote: “Strong lives are motivated by dynamic purposes.”
Author: Kenneth Hildebrand

quote: “The choice to make good choices is the best choice you can choose. Fail to make that choice and on most choices you will lose.”
Author: Ryan Lilly

quote: “You spend your TIME to make a DIME. You lose your HEALTH to make your WEALTH, but at the end it is FUNNY because you leave back all your MONEY.”
Author: rvm

quote: “Failing to make it to the list of the best 5 students in class or not being named the team captain should not make anyone feel like they have failed.”
Author: Stephen Richards,

quote: “When you act on your beliefs, the realisation that happens is caused by you and this will in turn lead to a consequence.”
Author: Stephen Richards,

quote: “Tap into ‘The Force’ and soon, at any given time that you need that extra shot of high octane confidence; you will soon be like a Jedi Master at this technique.”
Author: Stephen Richards,

quote: “Everyday of your life is a another lesson. If you learn the lesson well and apply it; whether positive or negative, you determine what happens in your tomorrow.”
Author: David Kofi Awusi

quote: “[...] what's the use of lying down to die as long as we can stand up and walk.”
Author: Dean King,

quote: “What is done is done for the love of it- or not really done at all.”
Author: Robert Frost

quote: “Your environment will eat your goals and plans for breakfast.”
Author: Steve Pavlina

quote: “POEMINHA DO CONTRA
Author: Mario Quintana

quote: “Stop allowing your outdated ideas to hinder your progress. How would your life be different if you became open to new information that can refine, improve, enhance your way of thinking, and empower your way of living?”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Pure happiness and peace are at their peak when your body is in harmony with itself.”
Author: Asa Don Brown,

quote: “البسطاء لا يحبون الأضواء ولا يشعرون بالحاجة إليها فالضوء المنبعث في داخلهم يكفيهم ويشعرهم بأنهم أهم من يعيش على الكرة الأرضية دون أن يصيبهم ذلك بداء الغرور”
Author: ياسر حارب,

quote: “If we can acquire an attitude of self-belief, then we will surely determine our future actions and our future life opportunities.”
Author: Stephen Richards,

quote: “It's the days you have every right to breakdown and fall apart, yet choose to show up anyway that matter most. Don't diminish the small steps that others can't see.”
Author: Brittany Burgunder

quote: “Every minute doing one thing is a minute not doing something else. Every choice is another choice not made another path grown over lost.”
Author: Jerry Weintraub,

quote: “إن كثرة تفكيرنا في آلامنا تحيلها إلى واقع حتى وإن كانت وهماً وتضخّمها في أعيننا رغم ضآلتها أحياناً .. ألم تتساءل لماذا لا تموت القردة المصابة بمرض الإيدز بسرعة؟ الجواب هو لأنها لا تعلم بأنها مريضة”
Author: ياسر حارب,

quote: “Second half of the year starts NOW July 1st with the next 6 months being MORE important than the last 6 months. I Your Name promise to do all that I can to achieve my Goal . I will not sit on a corner wait I will seek my opportunity. I promise to go after my Goal with passion knowing that the clock is ticking… Sign and date”
Author: Pablo

quote: “Life seems to be fashioned and formed best out of the obstacles that seem unbearable.”
Author: John Paul Warren

quote: “There are two kinds of leaders, cowboys and Shepherds. Cowboys drive and Shepherds lead.”
Author: John Paul Warren

quote: “While spirituality provides an efficient and endless fuel for your mind and body, you must burn that fuel with human action towards your goals, dreams, and desires.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “I have not learned a single lesson, been inspired or impacted by another person’s life void of negative experiences.”
Author: John Paul Warren

quote: “It's not about what I SEE for our future, or humanity; It's about what I DO for our future and humanity.”
Author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “الظلال تمنحنا الراحة وكثرتها تمنحنا الخمول”
Author: ياسر حارب,

quote: “الحياة دون أحلام هي حياة مؤلمة بلا شك”
Author: ياسر حارب,

quote: “Small thinking and big dreams is an oxymoron”
Author: John Paul Warren

quote: “The Sun never sets. It is we who rise think to shine. ”
Author: Earle Birney

quote: “The real architect of a life is the hard and almost impossible circumstances one faces.”
Author: John Paul Warren

quote: “If you believe ,you can.
Author: Divyansh Mishra DM

quote: “How would your life be different if...You didn’t wait for someone else to fix a problem or social issue? Let today be the day...You take up a cause that you feel in your heart and give your time and efforts towards that cause.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “We don't have to take our personality so personally.”
Author: Wes Nisker

quote: “Dust sleeping on your bookshelf
Author: Akash Mandal

quote: “The Sun-Dial at Wells College
Author: Henry Van Dyke

quote: “For young adults,the growth from silly to serious can be very fast, indeed.”
Author: Dean Cumings

quote: “Live Life Fully & Abundantly”
Author: Gabbriella Conte

quote: “How far can your imagination take you? I don't know. That's up to you, but I think you should find out.”
Author: Destiny Booze

quote: “At dawn, we awake to new dreams, new times, a new life. Each day is a time to start again, a blank slate to fill with daily wishes, daily dreams. Each day is a new life with new opportunity to be whoever we want to be.”
Author: Avina Celeste

quote: “You can't
Author: Curtis Tyrone Jones

quote: “If you can show people how to build castles, make sure you do not neglect building and nurturing your own.”
Author: Suzy Kassem,

quote: “The most unlucky generation is the one which couldn't produce a hero to look upto.”
Author: Amit Kalantri,

quote: “I m human, I m not perfect. Although, I make mistakes all the time.”
Author: Chetan bhagat

quote: “Get off the treadmill of consumption, replication, and mediocrity. Begin lifting the weights of creativity, originality, and success.”
Author: Ryan Lilly

quote: “Momentum builds success.”
Author: Suzy Kassem,

quote: “Like everything else, we know the futility of money only when we have more than enough of it.”
Author: R. N. Prasher

quote: “Nothing is permanent in my mysterious world, even my moments of belief - Jenifer”
Author: Durgesh Satpathy,

quote: “Entertainment is temporary happiness, but the real happiness is permanent entertainment.”
Author: Amit Kalantri

quote: “Health is hearty, health is harmony, health is happiness.”
Author: Amit Kalantri,

quote: “The decision is your own voice, an opinion is the echo of someone else's voice.”
Author: Amit Kalantri,

quote: “Don't let him take who you are. Make him fear who you'll become.”
Author: Mary Weber,

quote: “Killing a cruelty is not a cruelty.”
Author: Amit Kalantri

quote: “If you can't impress them with your argument, impress them with your actions.”
Author: Amit Kalantri,

quote: “Common man's patience will bring him more happiness than common man's power.”
Author: Amit Kalantri,

quote: “There is nothing that works out for the worst that won't work out for the better.”
Author: Karldon Okruta

quote: “If you've delayed achieving your goals, have you ever asked yourself, "What's stopping you?”
Author: Elizabeth Parker,

quote: “Self -pity is the worst form of poison. It kills a person without the person realizing it ~ Aarush Kashyap”
Author: Kirtida Gautam

quote: “The time is now, the person is you; better your life and become a name to conjure with in this day and age.”
Author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha,

quote: “Mixing old wine with new wine is stupidity, but mixing old wisdom with new wisdom is maturity.”
Author: Amit Kalantri,

quote: “It is our action that determines the viability of our dream.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “To become, you must first believe.”
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: “Best Way to Stay Happy is to be busy.”
Author: Dipika Agarwal

quote: “Always be happy, you never know how happy you can make another by just being happy.”
Author: Ogwo David Emenike,

quote: “Let people be the pursuits of happiness, you be the pursuit of perfection.”
Author: Amit Kalantri

quote: “You're going to find the people that make it work NEVER quit, quitting is NOT an option.”
Author: Bob Proctor

quote: “You have tried to be superior in an ordinary realm. Now you must learn to be ordinary in a superior realm.”
Author: Dan Millman,

quote: “The greatest reward for a man's failure is not necessarily the consequent success, but what he becomes by it.”
Author: Ogwo David Emenike,

quote: “jika sebuah mata harus dibalas dengan sebuah mata, hanya akan membuat seluruh dunia ini buta”
Author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: “mereka tidak dapat mengambil harga diri kita kalau kita tidak memberikannya kepada mereka”
Author: Mahatma Gandhi,

quote: “It's not about perfect. It's about effort. And when you bring that effort every single day, that's where transformation happens. That's how change occurs.”
Author: Jillian Michaels

quote: “The way you live your day is a sentence in the story of your life. Each day you make the choice whether the sentence ends with a period, question mark, or exclamation point.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “The universe doesn’t give you what you ask for with your thoughts; it gives you what you demand with your actions. In essence, you don't get what you WANT, you get what you ARE.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Acceptance makes an incredible fertile soil for the seeds of change.”
Author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “...Or we can blaze! Become legends in our own time, strike fear in the heart of mediocre talent everywhere! We can scald dogs, put records out of reach! Make the stands gasp as we blow into an unearthly kick from three hundred yards out! We can become God's own messengers delivering the dreaded scrolls! We can race dark Satan himself till he wheezes fiery cinders down the back straightaway....They'll speak our names in hushed tones, 'those guys are animals' they'll say! We can lay it on the line, bust a gut, show them a clean pair of heels. We can sprint the turn on a spring breeze and feel the winter leave our feet! We can, by God, let our demons loose and just wail on!”
Author: John L. Parker Jr.,

quote: “Procrastination is the bad habit of putting of until the day after tomorrow what should have been done the day before yesterday.”
Author: Napoleon Hill

quote: “A life without regret can be attained by full awareness of one's actions in their present moment.”
Author: Michelle D. Rosado

quote: “Instead of bracing yourself for the perils of the unknown, embrace the joy that is here, in your present moment.”
Author: Michelle D. Rosado

quote: “Athletes who are able to stay completely focused in pursuit of their dreams are the ones that are most likely to become champions.”
Author: Steve Backley,

quote: “There’s a Chinese proverb that says “Wisdom is avoiding all thoughts that weaken you & embracing those that strengthen you” Your mind is like a Ferrari (Or your favorite car) it is Awesome!...but if you put sand on the gas tank it won’t run. Don’t put sand (negativity) on your mind. Think positive, encouraging, uplifting thoughts, & the negative will soon evaporate.”
Author: Pablo

quote: “Spirituality is for people. It’s not just for those who you might have read about in books, it’s for people.”
Author: Belsebuub

quote: “There is a thin line between the impossible and the possible - that is determination.”
Author: Ogwo David Emenike

quote: “Death is more uni­ver­sal than life; everyone dies but not every­one lives.”
Author: Alan Sachs

quote: “Success is within reach of all people, but you can grasp it only when you realise the power within you.”
Author: Stephen Richards,

quote: “المتصالح مع ذاته يشبه النهر الذي يستمر في صبّ مياهه العذبة في البحر المالح على الرغم من علمه بأنه لن يحيله حلواً، فهو يعلم بأن مهمّته تكمن في ري الأراضي التي يمر عليها وليس في تحلية مياه البحر”
Author: ياسر حارب,

quote: “Who should we be trying to make the most proud? Our family? Our friends? Our teachers or bosses? What about the one who molded us out of the earth itself, who formed us like clay, and instilled within us the very breath of life that shaped the universe?”
Author: James D. Maxon

quote: “السعادةُ لا تأتي بشروط”
Author: ياسر حارب,

quote: “Circumstances, knowledge or birth do not determine the realisation of your desires. It is only you who are blocking the achievement of your dreams and goals.”
Author: Stephen Richards,

quote: “معرفتك لأسباب فشلك ستوصلك إلى القمة ومعرفتك لأسباب نجاحك ستبقيك عليها”
Author: ياسر حارب,

quote: “Ideas and philosophies have a shelf-life. They must be kept fresh and renewed or they will spoil. If left unattended, the same ideas and philosophies that once nourished you and helped you grow can poison you and make you sick. Become aware of new ideas that can refresh your way of life and be open to the fact that your old ideas and philosophies can work for you for some time, but when the shelf-life has passed, those ideas and philosophies could also harm you.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “This inner Being is all powerful, intelligent, indestructible and a storehouse of knowledge and wisdom. This inner core is truly who and what you are and is perpetually trying to connect with your outward self.”
Author: Stephen Richards,

quote: “Just be happy that it is what it is and not what it could be because after all, it could always be worse”
Author: Connor George Serbin

quote: “السعادة طريقة وليست طريقا”
Author: ياسر حارب,

quote: “be who you set out to be...”
Author: Gino Norris

quote: “Each man follows his own path - his own destiny, if you will. And only he is responsible for the choice.”
Author: Heather Graham,

quote: “It so happens that at times your desires tend to disagree with the reality and this is due to the fact that you have not let the two elements complement each other.”
Author: Stephen Richards,

quote: “Bukan sifatku untukk kalah tanpa bertarung, bahkan saat kemungkinan untuk menang tampak begitu tipis. -Katniss”
Author: Suzanne Collins,

quote: “We, as human beings, enjoy freedom of choice.
Author: Lorii Myers,

quote: “To believe in miracles in one thing...to know what miracle you want to manifest right now, and accept it, is another.”
Author: Michelle D. Rosado

quote: “laughing is good. so long as you are not insulting anyone.”
Author: A Gentlemen

quote: “Strive to make small changes and learn something new daily, because there is always these experiences you have had to tap into for the future.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Convince yourself everyday that you are worthy of a good life. Let go of stress, breathe. Stay positive, all is well.”
Author: Germany Kent

quote: “Bukan melupakan yang jadi masalahnya. Barangsiapa yang bisa menerima, maka dia akan bisa melupakan, hidup bahagia. Tapi jika dia tidak bisa menerima, dia tidak akan pernah bisa melupakan.”
Author: Tere Liye,

quote: “Those who don't value their words, will never value your wishes.”
Author: Amit Kalantri,

quote: “True leaders bring out your personal best. They ignite your human potential”.”
Author: John Paul Warren

quote: “Bukan seberapa lama umat manusia bisa bertahan hidup sebagai ukuran kebahagiaan, tapi seberapa besar kemampuan mereka memeluk erat-erat semua hal menyakitkan yang mereka alami.”
Author: Tere Liye,

quote: “الصداقة الحقيقية تُعيدُ تعريف المطر لأنها تأتي دون مقابل”
Author: ياسر حارب,

quote: “Live as many lives as you can.”
Author: Sanober Khan

quote: “I figure, sometimes, bad things happen to us so we can achieve a higher purpose and attain greater happiness and fulfillment in life.”
Author: Omoakhuana Anthonia

quote: “The secret to strong leaders is that strong leaders are strong because they have been tempered by the negative. They have discovered the secret of combining the negative and the positive to PRODUCED their very own POWER plant!”
Author: John Paul Warren

quote: “الأملُ ثورة فرديةٌ على الألم”
Author: ياسر حارب,

quote: “MY FIVE DOS FOR GETTING BACK INTO THE GAME:
Author: Bill Walsh,

quote: “Everyone has too much of something, whether it’s time, talent or treasure. Everyone does have their own half, you just have to find it.”
Author: Hannah Salwen,

quote: “To fall in love for any reason does cause fires of emotion. When we are in love, we ride on a positive energy as compared to not being in love. When we are love, we transcend conditional love to that of unconditional and we are now flowering in consciousness. Love is a very important element of consciousness as it becomes purer with Source union even as our consciousness is expanded further. Consciousness is love that is light.”
Author: Nandhi Tapasyogi,

quote: “You have pissed your last in this house . . . and I don't make velvet roses anymore.”
Author: Toni Morrison,

quote: “Dare to be a fool in the face of impossibilities.”
Author: TemitOpe Ibrahim

quote: “Greatness comes from the inside and once you believe you have it, it's yours to share with the world.”
Author: Chris Burkmenn

quote: “Do not let arrogance go to your head and despair to your heart.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “In our worldly perceptions of Jesus, we tend to embrace the kindness of his love ('be encouraged') but not the discipline of his love ('and sin no more'). But with the whole scope of his love, or maturity in Christ, we begin relying on him for guidance where we would prefer him to walk beside us rather than behind us.”
Author: Criss Jami,

quote: “If thinking should precede acting, then acting must succeed thinking.”
Author: Amit Kalantri,

quote: “Holding on to the past will hold you down in life. Learn from it but move on.”
Author: Jonathan Anthony Burkett

quote: “You are the most important project in your life. Spend time, work carefully, and act with positive intent as you work to create your best self. This life is your masterpiece. You are a masterpiece.”
Author: Avina Celeste

quote: “If you dare take the challenge, you will possess the courage to conquer.”
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: “The strong man is not one who is good at wrestling, but the strong man is one who controls himself in a fit of rage.”
Author: Prophet Mohammed

quote: “Usually people don't see beyond the surface of things and cannot understand more other than the obvious; they are used to judging a book by its cover, and that is why they don't hesitate to bully.”
Author: Maria Karvouni

quote: “Only hardship softens the hardness of the human heart.”
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: “What would life be if we didn't shake and wake ourselves up once and a while”
Author: Heather Richards

quote: “Strange things are always abounding. Watch and discern. There is always a lesson to be learned.
Author: Vanessa Richardson,

quote: “One sure way to kill a dream, is to suffocate it with worry.”
Author: TemitOpe Ibrahim

quote: “أعرف أنك في هذه الآونة تقعين أحيانا فريسة لخوفك من الحياة أكثر من خوفك من الموت. وأعلم أنك في سبيل الخلاص من هذه المعاناة تلجئين في الغالب أكثر فأكثر لخيالك. لكن مايغيب عنك أن خيالك الآن هو بصدد تدميرك.
Author: غيوم ميسو - عائد لأبحث عنك

quote: “Well, if it can be thought, it can be done, a problem can be overcome,”
Author: E.A. Bucchianeri,

quote: “Easily mistaken, it is not about a love for adversity, it is about knowing a strength and a faith so great that adversity, in all its adverse manifestations, hardly even exists.”
Author: Criss Jami,

quote: “Like everything in life, it is not what happens to you but how you respond to it that counts.”
Author: Steve Backley,

quote: “Everyone has moments of weakness. But that doesn't make you weak.”
Author: Katie Alender,

quote: “Don’t hide what you have just because people tell you it’s not normal. I have known normal people…and guess what? They are as boring as hell...”
Author: Sidney Knight

quote: “Reach for the sky but keep your feet on the ground”
Author: Phil Limbert

quote: “Shame and blame should have no place in our body, mind, or spirit.”
Author: Asa Don Brown

quote: “It is never about who is right or wrong, it is about what is best.”
Author: Steve Backley,

quote: “Just like your body and lifestyle can be healthy or unhealthy, the same is true with your beliefs. Your beliefs can be your medicine or your poison.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Our perceptions are influenced by our surroundings.”
Author: Asa Don Brown,

quote: “You can start to change your luck today. Begin believing that you can have what you desire and superior things will arrive.”
Author: Steve Backley,

quote: “Don't be indifferent about any random idea that occurs to you, because each and every idea is for a particular purpose. it may not be beneficial to you, but can be what others are craving for”
Author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quote: “Ability, experience and books have solution for all the problems.”
Author: Amit Kalantri

quote: “Fear is the Fatal killer of Desire.”
Author: zig ziggler

quote: “The thrust of continuous action is the firewood which fuels motivation.”
Author: Steve Backley,

quote: “Through my choices and actions, I have learned the most effective way of speaking to God is without saying a word.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “On your quest to spirituality it is often required to suspend your rationality; but true spirituality asks that you enhance your rationality.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Your youth is certainly finished and old age has definitely arrived if you feel that you are losing enthusiasm, excitement and energy towards your dreams and goals.”
Author: Amit Kalantri

quote: “Don't violate the law, but don't reject an idea because it's illegal. You might be able to get the law changed.”
Author: ROBERTH H. SCHULLER

quote: “Compromise brings harmony to both, happiness to none.”
Author: Amit Kalantri

quote: “Holding on, holding out and holding fast when the going is tough constitutes a winning mindset.”
Author: Ogwo David Emenike,

quote: “Faith is the poetry of our dreams; action is the builder of our reality.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “If you are not able to see your goals, they will take longer to achieve, and sometimes “longer” is "never.”
Author: Honoree Corder,

quote: “Along our chosen paths, we all meet up with demons. We must meet them, and battle them, even when they are nothing but mist in the night.”
Author: Heather Graham,

quote: “I ask myself: Are Defeats necessary ?
Author: Paulo Coelho

quote: “Make peace with your past so you don't mess up the present!”
Author: Marcia Casar Friedman

quote: “We learn best when we care about what we are doing, when we have choices. We learn best when the work has meaning to us, when it matters. We learn best when we are using our hands and our minds.We learn best when the work we are doing is real and relevant.”
Author: Dennis Littky,

quote: “Viața nu e suport pentru artă. Invers stau lucrurile.”
Author: Stephen King,

quote: “Between natural ability and education choose natural ability, as it will keep you happy and will fetch you the glory sooner.”
Author: Amit Kalantri

quote: “It takes understanding to be outstanding”
Author: Pastor Simeon Nwani

quote: “Anytime you're afraid to try something new...just remember, amateurs built the ark, professionals built the titanic.”
Author: Drake

quote: “To achieve anything, you must be prepared to dabble on the boundary of disaster.”
Author: Stirling Moss

quote: “Without inspiration the best powers of the mind remain dormant. There is a fuel in us which needs to be ignited with sparks.”
Author: Johann Gottfried Von Herder

quote: “The “Warrior Ethos” emphasizes placing the mission first, not accepting defeat, and being disciplined physically and mentally. Why? Because an American Soldier is a “guardian of freedom and the American way of life.”
Author: Dan Smee,

quote: “Did you have a rough month? I did :( but, you know what? There’s no time to dwell on a missed opportunity or worry about what I should’ve done or said, beating myself up & making myself miserable about my mistakes. That doesn’t work. So will take notes from that, put it behind me, move on & finish the year STRONG”
Author: Pablo

quote: “Get a grip on yourself. there's only one god here on earth, and that's you. If you don't like the world, make one you like better.”
Author: Yasmina Khadra

quote: “العُظماء هم الذين انتصروا على أنفسهم قبل أن ينتصروا على الآخرين”
Author: ياسر حارب,

quote: “كلما زادت وُعورة الطريق كانت نهايته أجمل”
Author: ياسر حارب,

quote: “الموهبة تصنع لك بداية جميلة والإصرار يصنع لك نهاية أجمل”
Author: ياسر حارب,

quote: “اليأس هو آخر محاولة قبل النجاح”
Author: ياسر حارب,

quote: “Shrug off the no’s – they are temporary. This is your world. In your world there is only yes.”
Author: Jolene Stockman,

quote: “Trust your passion, identify your dreams, and find the courage to share them with others, no matter how many times they call you a fool.”
Author: Bill Strickland,

quote: “النّصرُ لا يتأخر نحن الذين نسْتَعجِله”
Author: ياسر حارب,

quote: “عندما أفشلُ أُوقِنُ بأنني أسير في الطريق الصحيح لأن الفشل يدفعني إلى العمل أكثر”
Author: ياسر حارب,

quote: “التفاؤل قَدَرٌ لم يتحقق بعد”
Author: ياسر حارب,

quote: “Submission to what people call their 'lot' is simply ignoble. If your lot makes you cry and be wretched, get rid of it and take another.”
Author: Elizabeth von Arnim

quote: “النصرُ لا يتأتّى لِمَن يُمعِنُ النظر خلفه”
Author: ياسر حارب,

quote: “أحب مفترقات الطرق لأنها تدفعنا إلى الاختيار”
Author: ياسر حارب,

quote: “عندما نتأمّل فإننا نعرف دون أن نفكّر ونصل دون أن نقطع الطريق”
Author: ياسر حارب,

quote: “النجاح يدلّنا على الطريق والفشل يدلّنا على الطريقة”
Author: ياسر حارب,

quote: “Not matter what your sacred or religious book is, it's not how well you know the book, it's how well you're in alignment with the author.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “النهضة ليست خُرافة إذا آمنا بها وحتى الخرافات تكون مُلهمة أحيانا”
Author: ياسر حارب,

quote: “Living life ONCE is enough...if you live life RIGHT.”
Author: John Paul warren

quote: “الأفكار العظيمة هي التي تجعلنا نتحمّس من أجلها لا التي تجعلنا نغضب من أجلها”
Author: ياسر حارب,

quote: “Life of any real value or substance is not formed during good times merely enjoyed.”
Author: John Paul Warren

quote: “Cada persona tendrá su propia lista, su propio pedazo del país colgado del corazón. Una lista larga, rica colorida, voluptuosa, fragante. Una lista con la cual contener el pesimismo; una vacuna contra la desilusión. Una lista de lo mejor de México. Una lista para despertarse en las mañanas.”
Author: Denise Dresser,

quote: “Don’t forget to collect the memories on your journey. Remember, if you only focus on your destination, you will miss out on the benefits of the journey.”
Author: Tanya R. Liverman,

quote: “Great treasures bring out great greed in the hearts of men and great greed has been the downfall of many nations. - from "Opoponax Dreams”
Author: Genieve Dawkins

quote: “... Gunpei Yokoi, asked his boss, 'What should I make?' Nintendo chief executive Hiroshi Yamauchi replied, 'Something great.'
Author: David Sheff

quote: “Confidence can be learned - but not from a book. Confidence comes from from living.”
Author: Saskia Shakin,

quote: “Turn obstacles into opportunities and problems into possibilities.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett,

quote: “I'm not happy when I'm writing, but I'm more unhappy when I'm not.”
Author: Fannie Hurst

quote: “For this reason a prince ought to take care that he never lets anything slip from his lips that is not replete with the above-named five qualities, that he may appear to him who sees and hears him altogether merciful, faithful, humane, upright, and religious. There is nothing more necessary to appear to have than this last quality, inasmuch as men judge generally more by the eye than by the hand, because it belongs to everybody to see you, to few to come in touch with you. Every one sees what you appear to be, few really know what you are, and those few dare not oppose themselves to the opinion of the many, who have the majesty of the state to defend them; and in the actions of all men, and especially of princes, which it is not prudent to challenge, one judges by the result.”
Author: Niccolò Machiavelli,

quote: “...[I]ron discipline does not preclude but presupposes criticism and contest of opinion within the Party. Least of all does it mean that discipline must be 'blind'. On the contrary, iron discipline does not preclude but presupposes conscious and voluntary submission, for only conscious discipline can be truly iron discipline.”
Author: Joseph Stalin

quote: “The moon stared at me through sprinkled nighttime stardust and I alone smile.”
Author: Jay     Long

quote: “After you hear and listen. First must come desire. Second must come willingness.
Author: Hyrum Yeakley

quote: “In your name, the family name is at last because it's the family name that lasts.”
Author: Amit Kalantri,

quote: “At the end of the day, it’s your life. If you turn out good, the world celebrates you and with you (not minding how you achieved it). If bad, they abandon you (even if they gave you the advice that led you to doom). Just be you and follow your heart.”
Author: Omoakhuana Anthonia
