quote: “Hopes, wants and wishes, all cast across the night sky with my heart in tow.”
Author: Jay     Long

quote: “Those who win never quit; those who quit never win.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Do not be complacent about your achievements and not to strive for continual improvement when you get to the top. As soon as you let success go to your head, you sink into following familiar patterns and play it safe. In other words, you risk losing your edge.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Never ever forget that you enlisted in the ranks – you weren’t press ganged or drafted. Nobody owes you anything – least of all respect for your work – until you’ve earned it with what you put on the page.”
Author: T.F. Rigelhof

quote: “Your rebel soul shines like a diamond pulled from dust: bright, clear and flawless.”
Author: Jay     Long

quote: “She sincerely wishes success, for her new life, and intends that no failure of effort, temper, or spirits on her part will jeopardise it.”
Author: Jude Morgan,

quote: “What you wish to be, be.”
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: “Don't go downhill just because it's easy. The view is only visible from the top.”
Author: Destiny Booze

quote: “Win or lose, you are trying, that's what matters.”
Author: Avina Celeste

quote: “No crime is a means to an end. No crime can be rationalized.”
Author: Compton Gage

quote: “Confident Assured Posture: Foundation of Powerful Style”
Author: Cindy Ann Peterson,

quote: “Changing a Habit is Never Difficult.
Author: Vineet Raj Kapoor

quote: “If you are paying someone to motivate you (seriously), you should rather pay to a psychiatrist.”
Author: Anupam S Shlok

quote: “If one million of you give assent to the one thousand who participate in the murder of a child, then one million of you are a million times guilty.”
Author: Compton Gage

quote: “If one thousand of you participate in the murder of one child, then one thousand of you are a thousand times guilty.”
Author: Compton Gage

quote: “Start small and keep going.”
Author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: “There’s an interesting story about Abraham Lincoln. During the American Civil War he signed an order transferring certain regiments, but Secretary of War Edwin Stanton refused to execute it, calling the president a fool. When Lincoln heard he replied, ‘If Stanton said I’m a fool then I must be, for he’s nearly always right, and he says what he thinks. I’ll step over and see for myself.’ He did, and when Stanton convinced him the order was in error, Lincoln quietly withdrew it. Part of Lincoln’s greatness lay in his ability to rise above pettiness, ego, and sensitivity to other people’s opinions. He wasn’t easily offended. He welcomed criticism, and in doing so demonstrated one of the strengths of a truly great person: humility. So, have you been criticised? Make it a time to learn, not lose.”
Author: Patience Johnson,

quote: “Man is not merely born to make money. But to fulfill is mission.”
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: “Not all things that fall down break. Some develop wings.”
Author: Neelam Saxena Chandra

quote: “There is only one thing that is more natural than thinking: breathing.  And it is in breathing that we find the door to happiness.”
Author: Mario Maruffi

quote: “A well-written article does not make what was written factual or something to subscribe to.
Author: Loren Weisman

quote: “We put great expectations on our tomorrows when we truly need to rely on ourselves. Far too many overlook personal action, as a means to get things done. Blame is easily passed if one does not hold themselves accountable.”
Author: Jay     Long

quote: “We cannot walk alone. And as we walk, we must make the pledge that we shall always march ahead. We cannot turn back.”
Author: Martin Luther King Jr.,

quote: “Before this generation lose the wisdom, one advice - read books.”
Author: Amit Kalantri,

quote: “Tomorrow will never call to ask your opinion; you don't control it. Stop allowing today's possibilities to be robbed by tomorrow's insecurities.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “Time is too short in this one life, to be able to do everything,
Author: Sujit Lalwani,

quote: “In meetings philosophy might work,
Author: Amit Kalantri

quote: “When you practice leadership,The evidence of quality of your leadership, Is known from the type of leaders that emerge out of your leadership”
Author: Sujit Lalwani,

quote: “You are conditioned to believe that if you let go, if you surrender, you will either be a victim of circumstances and not assertive in your own being, or you will be viewed as being lazy, lacking in willpower, and un-motivated.
Author: Kelly    Martin,

quote: “The victory over our inner self is a daily struggle. Be strong and do not give up.”
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita,

quote: “Those who win never give up.
Author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “When you start to accept responsibility for the results you get in life, you also take back the power to change your future outcome.”
Author: Kevin Ngo,

quote: “Be the positive impact on someone’s life.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Comfort zone: simply means the routine of one’s daily life – it is a psychological state in which one feels familiar, safe, at ease, and secure.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Let's always try to paint the truth ... our art must be made to mean something.”
Author: E.A. Bucchianeri,

quote: “Learning to focus on the big picture will help you keep things in a proper perspective.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Just like waves in the ocean come and go, no challenge is permanent. Problems will come and go too. We must enjoy the Challenges just like we enjoy the Waves. - RVM.”
Author: rvm

quote: “With a decision and a defined purpose, you can begin work.”
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita,

quote: “Patience, more than the ability to bear pains or endure waiting, is to be calm no matter what happens – constantly take action to turn it to positive growth opportunities – and have faith to believe that it will all work out in the end while you are waiting.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Be creative enough to dream, brave enough to try, persistent enough to succeed, and humble enough to thank those who helped you along the way.”
Author: Elizabeth Parker,

quote: “The results of knowledge without application results in nothing at all. Do what you know better to do.”
Author: Dewayne Owens

quote: “Failure does not connote that you achieved nothing. It denotes that you are on an adventure towards finding what will eventually advance you to the realization of your goals.”
Author: Ogwo David Emenike,

quote: “It’s been said that legends are those who shape change into greatness; shaping change is one of the hallmarks of genius.”
Author: Julian Pencilliah,

quote: “Live! Don't just Exist!!! Don't drag through Life...Live each day as a Celebration.-RVM”
Author: RVM

quote: “Busca, descubre, innova, conoce, encuentra… y sigue buscando.”
Author: Fernando Araya

quote: “En la vida se tienen pretextos o resultados. Hay quienes piensan que ambas cosas valen lo mismo.”
Author: Andrew Matthews,

quote: “That failure serves a purpose!”
Author: Ogwo David Emenike,

quote: “Problems are everywhere, so are Solutions. Unfortunately, we see more of the Problems than the Solutions.-RVM”
Author: RVM

quote: “RVM Thoughts for Today -
Author: RVM

quote: “There is nothing so convincing as a thing well done.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Wisdom comes from knowing the order of things...and you are the first order of your business.”
Author: Elaine Marolakos Edelson,

quote: “Be as successful as a Smith.”
Author: Gregory C Dugger

quote: “Make your lives a masterpiece, you only get one canvas.”
Author: E.A. Bucchianeri,

quote: “Too often, people get stuck in a state of over-thinking, the result is that they never reach a decision.”
Author: Steve Backley,

quote: “The enemy of art is the absence of limitations.”
Author: Orson Welles

quote: “Compete like you cannot fail.”
Author: Steve Backley,

quote: “The first step is the most important. It is the most crucial and the most effective as it will initiate the direction you have chosen.”
Author: Steve Backley,

quote: “Act like a champion, and then become one.”
Author: Steve Backley,

quote: “Share your aspirations only with those who will support you, not those who will respond with doubt or lack of interest.”
Author: Steve Backley,

quote: “Blame is the creed of the disempowered.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “I acquired courage from the masterpieces of sages. I came of age by their instructions to keep going, even in hard times. Then I learnt not to despair, even when it seemed that my world is falling apart. I learnt to possess fortitude.”
Author: Ogwo David Emenike

quote: “You can keep pondering on which thing to do first or which path to take or by simply taking action now of most any kind, you may just find yourself on the way to where you most needed to go.”
Author: April Bryan

quote: “If you remain static and wait for success to come to you it will certainly not happen.”
Author: Steve Backley,

quote: “If you want to continue to be the best in the world, then you have to train and compete like you are second best in the world.”
Author: Steve Backley,

quote: “A man who has come to the full realization of his responsibility to men won't stick to one man. It will be foolhardy if he does that.”
Author: Ogwo David Emenike

quote: “Men's best successes come after their disappointments.”
Author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: “Nothing could be any worse than having to turn to your friends, your colleagues and your loved ones and say –‘I gave up too soon’.”
Author: Steve Backley,

quote: “It is one thing to know what should be done, it is another to do it.”
Author: Steve Backley,

quote: “Success is simply never giving in to failure - either in mind or body.”
Author: Steve Backley,

quote: “Mix with positive-minded people as a means to tap into your unexploited potential.”
Author: Steve Backley,

quote: “100% of a Guru’s marketing plan depends on you holding the belief that you are not enough; that you were created less equipped than necessary to fulfill your purpose. What if you let go of that belief and connected with the truth of your innate power to change and shape your life? You ARE enough. You CAN change and shape your own life. Anyone who tells you different is simply lying. Your life has immeasurable potentiality for greatness; act accordingly.”
Author: Steve Maraboli,

quote: “It is true to say that the secret of a winning formula is the ability to accept that there is a vast area of unexploited potential beyond what you currently perceive to be your maximum.”
Author: Steve Backley,

quote: “Perform your task and I shall know you. Perform your task and your genius shall befriend the more.”
Author: Ogwo David Emenike

quote: “When a man begins to do that which is assigned to him, it becomes as if he is more endowed and favoured than his fellows.”
Author: Ogwo David Emenike

quote: “The only test is what you see when you look in a mirror.”
Author: Steve Backley,

quote: “Over the years, I've come to realize that determination makes one to punch above one's weight.”
Author: Ogwo David Emenike

quote: “Maybe the secret to continued success is as simple as knowing that your past successes could be done so much better now.”
Author: Bill Loguidice

quote: “Just identify the very first physical action you need to take, and do it.”
Author: Steve Backley,

quote: “The sprint is like life ... blink and you miss it.”
Author: Steve Backley,

quote: “If you are able to focus unswervingly on your goals, then all that you desire will become yours.”
Author: Steve Backley,

quote: “You have to create your self-belief by going to your core to find the probable reasons for the negativity in you, and then demolish them.”
Author: Steve Backley,

quote: “The slogans “hang on” and “press on” have solved and will continue to solve the problems of humanity.”
Author: Ogwo David Emenike

quote: “There are three types of people in this world. Firstly, there are people who make things happen. Then there are people who watch things happen. Lastly, there are people who ask, what happened? Which do you want to be?”
Author: Steve Backley,

quote: “If not now, when?”
Author: Steve Backley,

quote: “If obstacles are large, jump higher.”
Author: Steve Backley,

quote: “Look for solutions, instead of being difficult; be more thoughtful, instead of allowing anger to burn you out. Look at things from a different perspective, embrace change, look out for opportunities and you will feel much more in control.”
Author: Steve Backley,

quote: “If you have positive energy you will always attract positive outcomes.”
Author: Steve Backley,

quote: “It is action that creates motivation.”
Author: Steve Backley,

quote: “See it first in your mind, then become it.”
Author: Steve Backley,

quote: “Every time a champion makes a decision they have a chance to learn something new, regardless of the outcome.”
Author: Steve Backley,

quote: “Invest your energy in the things you can control.”
Author: Steve Backley,

quote: “A mind filled with negative thoughts makes you feel miserable and inadequate and will lead to failure after failure no matter how hard you try to succeed.”
Author: Steve Backley,

quote: “Explore. Train your conscious mind and your subconscious mind to start working for you by getting those great powers to move in a new direction. Start creating your own good luck today.”
Author: Steve Backley,

quote: “Your current apathy is simply your soul telling you that it is confused.”
Author: Steve Backley,

quote: “Remember, if you don’t do anything – if you don’t change the way your mind works and direct your subconscious mind to create the life you want – then everything stays the same, nothing changes.”
Author: Steve Backley,

quote: “To think is good. To obsess is bad.”
Author: Steve Backley,

quote: “They don’t give Olympic medals out for talking a good game.”
Author: Steve Backley,

quote: “The challenge for you is to decide not what is important, but what is most important and then focus your attention on that.”
Author: Steve Backley,

quote: “Do you want to know what one of the secrets to achieving all of your goals is? You’ve got to be committed.”
Author: Steve Backley,

quote: “When you think a positive thought, you become positive.”
Author: Steve Backley,

quote: “If not you, who?”
Author: Steve Backley,

quote: “Although you can’t go back in time and alter your natural level of potential, you can determine how much of that ability you tap into, exploit and develop for the future.”
Author: Steve Backley,

quote: “Tell me your thinking, and I’ll tell you what your life looks like.”
Author: Steve Backley,

quote: “Success is virulent. Once you get the bug then it’s in you.”
Author: Steve Backley,

quote: “For many, lack of achievement is more a consequence of fear of taking a chance and getting uncomfortable.”
Author: Steve Backley,

quote: “The way forward is to stop pestering yourself for answers and let it, the creative part of your mind, come up with the solution when the time is right.”
Author: Steve Backley,

quote: “These are the people who will encourage you to go after your dreams and will inspire you to succeed. Stick to them like a barnacle to a rock.”
Author: Steve Backley,

quote: “If you decide not to take action, you are going to fail, and even if you do take action, if you can’t keep up your motivation, you will simply end up back where you started.”
Author: Steve Backley,

quote: “Trust in your own beliefs or succumb to the influence of others’.”
Author: Steve Backley,

quote: “The people and successes in your life mirror your beliefs.”
Author: Steve Backley,

quote: “See it, feel it, trust it!”
Author: Steve Backley,

quote: “To deliver your own personal maximum, you’ll realise there are no shortcuts; if you want to be a champion it is all about rolling your sleeves up and getting stuck in.”
Author: Steve Backley,

quote: “Are you living in the moment?”
Author: Asa Don Brown,

quote: “Are you seeking to be offended?”
Author: Asa Don Brown,

quote: “What is an unconditional state?”
Author: Asa Don Brown,

quote: “Lucky people will focus on what’s in front of them rather than scrabbling about for what they’re searching for.”
Author: Steve Backley,

quote: “If humans can live for 100 years, why do companies die so young.”
Author: Sukant Ratnakar,

quote: “I can only strive for what is important”
Author: Rosie Thomas,

quote: “The real beginning of influence comes as others sense you are being influenced by them--when they feel understood by you--that you have listened deeply and sincerely, and that you are open.”
Author: Stephen Cove

quote: “Ye are most strong, ye Sons of the icy North, of the far East, far marching from your rugged Eastern Wildernesses, hither-ward from the gray Dawn of Time! Ye are Sons of the Jotun-land; the land of Difficulties Conquered. Difficult? You
Author: Thomas Carlyle,

quote: “Fool! The Ideal is in thyself, the impediment too is in thyself: thy Condition is but the stuff thou art to shape that same Ideal out of: what matters whether such stuff be of this sort or that, so the Form thou give it be heroic, be poetic? O thou that pinest in the imprisonment of the Actual, and criest bitterly to the gods for a kingdom wherein to rule and create, know this of a truth: the thing thou seekest is already with thee, ‘here or nowhere,’ couldst thou only see!”
Author: Thomas Carlyle,

quote: “We cannot put off living until we are ready. The most salient characteristic of life is its coerciveness: it is always urgent, ‘here and now,’ without any postponement. Life is fired at us point-blank.”
Author: Jose Ortegay Y. Gasset

quote: “Тяжело бремя жизни": не прикидывайтесь такими неженками! Все мы выносливы, как вьючьные ослы.”
Author: Friedrich Nietzsche,

quote: “Jenifer always taught me that starting a job was one thing―—and admirable―—but that following through and completing―—well, that’s where the bravery is.”
Author: Valerie Estess,

quote: “PDA untuk mengurus masa”
Author: Ahmad Fadzli Yusof,

quote: “Look around you. Your world-hosts are all in mutiny, in confusion, destitution; on the eve of fiery wreck and madness! They will not march farther for you, on the sixpence a day and supply-demand principle; they will not; nor ought they, nor can they. Ye shall reduce them to order, begin reducing them. to order, to just subordination; noble loyalty in return for noble guidance. Their souls are driven nigh mad; let yours be sane and ever saner.”
Author: Thomas Carlyle,

quote: “We do not just go through life blindly,we create our own journey.
Author: Judie McCarty,

quote: “North Carolina has a monument to [Peter Francisco], and no one knows that. That's the kind of stuff that drives me.”
Author: Travis Scott Bowman,

quote: “(The subjects of What Should I Do With The Rest Of My Life) "have convinced me that past failing can as easily prove preparatory as predictive. Age does not of itself limit on enable us. The choice is ours.”
Author: Bruce Frankel

quote: “Do not rebel but repent when rebuked by the righteous God.”
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: “A gifted rebel is not an asset, he is a liability to the leadership. Your responsibility as a follower is to remain loyal and truth to the higher authority above you.”
Author: Olawale Daniel

quote: “Prayer is passionate plea for the possible.”
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: “Where there is revival, there is renewal.”
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: “There is nothing like the live for thy neighbour.”
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: “Pray privately.”
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: “In rebellion, a man reject his Maker.”
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: “Fearless faith, confident courage.”
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: “A repentant soul reconciled with God”
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: “Do not forsake the fatherless.”
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: “Life has no limitations except the ones we make.
Author: Jim Kwik,

quote: “अपनी सोच के बारे में सावधानी से सोचें, क्योंकि यह आपके विचार बन जाते हैं और विचार आपके भाग्य को निर्धारित करते हैं”
Author: Shiva Negi

quote: “Love is a Part of Life & not Life in itself!”
Author: Somya Kedia

quote: “Your dream life is just a dream away! Once you dream it you will get there!”
Author: Kanika Saxena,

quote: “As a researcher, good deeds and work on a new research idea should not be delayed at all.”
Author: Zeeshan Ali

quote: “I think sometimes the motivations you need are from few individuals, maybe just one or two who believes in you and keep reminding you of how strong willed you can be. Believe me such motivation could push you higher than one could ever imagine.”
Author: Deborah Nwakwesili.

quote: “You have come too far to quit.
Author: Deborah Nwakwesili.

quote: “I hate poverty as much as she hates me that's why we do not go along. Where ever she see's me, she runs like never before, she hates me so much because I shine too bright that it affects her eyes and makes her blind to notice me.”
Author: Deborah Nwakwesili.

quote: “One of the keys to success is staying focused. Staying focused on your dreams is like following the light in the tunnel even though you are walking through the dark.”
Author: Deborah Nwakwesili.

quote: “নিজেকে ভালোবাসো, আত্মবিশ্বাসী হও, জীবনে চলার পথে যত বড়ই ঝড় আসুক তোমাকে ভাঙ্গতে পারবেনা।”
Author: G.K. Dutta

quote: “জীবনে ভালো কাজ করা খুব বেশী প্রয়োজন। ভালো কাজ করে বড়লোক হওয়া যায়না ঠিকই, কিন্তু কঠিন সময়ে আত্মবিশ্বাসী হওয়া যায় এবং মানুষের নিঃস্বার্থ সহযোগিতা ও ভালোবাসা পাওয়া যায়।”
Author: G.K. Dutta

quote: “There is no radical change like repentance.”
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: “The solution is there, Emmaline. It just takes someone brave enough to find it.”
Author: Lauren DeStefano,

quote: “You must continue learning to increase in learning.”
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: “Humility of prayer is to ppurify the heart.”
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: “Humility of prayer is to purify the heart.”
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: “DONT FORGET THAT EVERYONE HAVE THE FREEDOM TO FAIL”
Author: PAPERBOAT QUOTES

quote: “Addressing the problem, and then taking this second step to fix the cause of the problem, distinguishes the people who are in control from the people who are not in control - the successful from the unsuccessful.”
Author: Sam Carpenter,

quote: “There are two kind of travellers: (1) They relax in their seat and enjoy the journey. Their train reaches the destination smoothly. (2) They remain agitated and desperate to reach the destination. They think they can relax only after reaching. Somehow their train always faces delays and obstacles.”
Author: Shunya

quote: “You can see the weakness in man when he's in competition with his family or his peers. When he could be in competition with himself.”
Author: Rasmee Yasin

quote: “Silence is the only offering that one could offer to the god and silence is his ultimate celebration.”
Author: Soman Gouda,

quote: “Men are born for adventures and women are born adventurous”
Author: Soman Gouda,

quote: “Beauty is in the flower not at its roots”
Author: Soman Gouda,

quote: “One thing I could assure is that they (dreams) bring out a mysterious artist in every human being, a befuddled artist with nebulous notions”
Author: Soman Gouda,

quote: “Past is something that you think you can chase, only until you realize that you are being chased by it”
Author: Soman Gouda,

quote: “Well, for me alone, coffee shops are like refugee camps”
Author: Soman Gouda,

quote: “In the temples, churches and mosques gods born and die, but in the libraries they grow and evolve”
Author: Soman Gouda,

quote: “Men get brave only by brave actions”
Author: Soman Gouda,

quote: “Express your heart amidst the nature, the god’s ultimate expression. That’s what I believed in”
Author: Soman Gouda,

quote: “Those glittery eyes of him looked up like the candles but never flickered. In one, he held the life and in the other, the death”
Author: Soman Gouda,

quote: “Humanity is divided by the dietary traditions but is united by the hunger”
Author: Soman Gouda,

quote: “The faith in the light, the vigor to plunge out from the mud and the sustained nobility to remain unstained by the past is what makes it a lotus”
Author: Soman Gouda,

quote: “In the secret most corner of my mind, I conspire to live like a lotus, as a lotus, buoyant, in full bloom, untainted”
Author: Soman Gouda,
